snippet.title: Home Cafe March☕️ Strawberry Ade, Strawberry Latte, Green Tea Latte | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
+To make fruit syrup
-Shortcut : Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide, etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar, and a splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hours, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

snippet.title: Best Ever French Toast 🧡 프렌치토스트 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Today’s menu is best ever French toast.
I already showed you guys in 'what I ate in a month’ video.
But I wanna make this recipe again, also wanna show you this recipe again! It’s THE BEST way to make French toast🥰

The key point of make this recipe is thick bread.
I used white bread, but you can use whole wheat bread or any kind of bread you can get.
And the next point is the ratio of basic ingredients, milk-sugar-egg-cinnamon.
If you follow my recipe, you can make 3 thick slices of bread of French toast. Wanna 1 portion of this, use 1/3~1/2 of the recipe.
 

🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
white bread
3 eggs
90ml(1/3cup plus 2tsp) milk
25g(5tsp) sugar
5g(1tsp) vanilla extract
1g(1/2tsp) ground cinnamon

unsalted butter 
Icing sugar
berries
vanilla ice cream
honey

1. Slice the bread about 3cm(1 inch).
2. Mix the eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, and ground cinnamon until well combined.
3. Soak the bread into egg mixture.
4. In a pan with low heat, put the butter and fry until it gets golden brown.
5. Serve with vanilla ice cream, berries, and icing sugar. Also, drizzle some honey or maple syrup.

snippet.description:
안녕하세요 :) 이번 영상은 집밥일기, 하루 식단일기를 담아봤어요

아침으로는 뮤즐리와 요거트, 아메리카노를 같이 즐겼어요
개인적으로 제일 좋아하는 요거트 브랜드인 액티비아와, 뮤즐리도 저번에 홈플러스에서 구매하고 맛있어서 종류별로 사먹고 있는 뮤즐리에요.


이번 영상은 홈플러스와 함께 제작하였는데요, 현재 홈플러스에서 22주년 맞이 행사를 하고 있어요~!
홈플러스에서 판매 품목들을 저렴하게 구매할 수 있고, 또 홈플튜버를 모집하고 있어서 다들 지원해보셨음 좋겠어요!

홈플튜버는 홈플러스와 함꼐 ‘홈플러스’를 주제로 한 영상 콘텐츠를 제작하는 유튜버에요.
모집기간은 3월 1일부터 24일까지니 아직 2주 조금 안되게 남았으니 꼭꼭 참여해보시길 바래요!
참여방법은 홈플러스 매장을 방문하여, 창립 22주년 행사상품들을 활용한 영상을 촬영해서 유튜브에 올리고, 지원서를 작성하면 끝!
저처럼 홈플러스에서 판매중인 PB제품들과 다양한 제품들을 이용해서 요리 영상을 간단하게 찍어도 된다고 하니 꼭꼭! 좋은 행사 참여해보세요 :)
게다가 총 1000만원 이상의 지원금을 제공한다니 너무너무 좋지요 *-*
이 외에 자세한 정보와 링크는 http://bit.ly/2J7t6xk 여기서 참고해주세요🥰

홈플러스에서 구매했다는 점 이외에 따로 제품 홍보는 없으니 편안하게 시청하셨으면 좋겠어요 :)
그리고 정말 세일을 많이 해서, 3월 한달 동안은 홈플러스에서 쭉 쇼핑할까봐요! 특히 폭립이 너무 맛있어서 또 해먹으려구요!

snippet.title: Singapore Chilli Crab 🌶🦀 싱가포르 칠리크랩 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey :) Today’s recipe is Singapore Chilli Crab.

In this recipe, i used store-bought chilli crab paste, brand ‘prima taste’. In Korea, you can find quite easily in any grocery store. Or if you go to Singapore, it’s in everywhere! (i think)

I didn’t follow the instruction perfectly, but it was really good😂😂 Of course, eat chilli crab in Singpore is best option. But like me, who miss the taste of Singapore, you will love this!
I used blue crab and shrimp for this. Blue crab is the easiest crab to find in Korea. If i can found big one, i would use that😭

In the instructions, they used peanut oil. But i didn’t have it and couldn’t found easily, so I used just plain normal veggie oil. And it turns out great!

And with this chilli crab, i ate whit spring onion-egg fired rice, which you can find easily in Chinese cuisine (or some other countries nearby).
For make this, put a veggie oil in a pan on medium-high heat. and put the chopped spring onion and garlic. Frying for about minute or so. and put the cooked rice and frying again. Season with salt and pepper.


**Some might be ‘what the hack’ that what i did to the crab…😂
Actually, it was my first time to cut the crab. I knew i was wrong while is eating this😅 But good thing is I can eat the fried rice in that crab shell better than clean cutting one!
But i think i have to make another video with crab, because now i know how to cut crabs😂


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Strawberry Cupcakes) : http://bit.ly/2sXeR3g
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!
 

🌙Ingredients
vegetable oil
2 crabs
5~6 shrimps
470ml water
chilli crab paste
chilli crab premix
30ml water, for chilli crab premix
2 eggs, lightly beaten
coriander leaves

prima taste - Singapore Chilli Crab

1. In a pan, drizzle the vegetable oil and put crabs and shrimps. Cover the lid and cook for about 2~3min on a medium to high heat, until crabs and shrimps are cooked. When it’s cooked, transfer the seafoods to the another bowl
2. Put the chilli crab sauce on a pan and mix on a medium heat. And put the seafoods again and mix well. Pour the water and cover the lid, until water is boiling..
3. Mix the chilli crab premix with water and pour onto the pan. Mix nicely.
4. Beat the egg and pour the eggs. Mix again and remove form heat. Serve with coriander leaves.

snippet.title: Hailey’s Home Cafe December ☕️ Frozen Hot Chocolate, Irish Coffee, Eggnog | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey with another monthly cafe at home in December.
In this month, I made frozen hot chocolate, Irish coffee and eggnog.

First I heard ‘frozen hot chocolate’, It reminds me some Koreans saying in cafe ‘Can I get warm ice americano?’. 😂
But after I taste it, I can see why this name is such a mess. It taste like hot chocolate, but it is ice! 😂😂
If I live in Australia, I would drink in every Christmas😆

I heard what is Irish coffee when I was teenager, maybe middle school student. So my dream ‘was’ drink Irish coffee. And my wish came true in 2018😂 
Taste was not same as what I thought in teenager, but Korea is freakin cold as northern Europe, so I can fully understand why Irish made this!

And lastly, eggnog.
Actually in Korea, eggnog is not that famous drinks. I think because of the name ‘egg’nog. But it was not that bad, and actually it was good!
But I think it’s too heavy for me, so with coffee or some rum, It would be nice!
And I’m not prefer to use raw egg, so I cooked and instead of meringue top of the drink, I used whipped cream. 

This is my last video in 2018. I’m not sure that I’ll continuing this type of video. 
If you have any other opinions or recommendations, comment down below! It will be very helpful!😂
And I’ll studying more English for communicate with you guys😆
Right now, my English is quite mess, but I hope you understand! Hope you had great 2018, and I will see you guys in next year! Happy new year everyone😘

snippet.description:

1. 야채들을 먹기좋은 크기로 썰어줍니다. 김치도 잘게 썰어 준비합니다.

snippet.description:
Hello viewers!
In this month, I made plum ade, ice chocolate latte and blueberry ade.

Instruction of plum ade and blueberry ade syrup is bottom of this description box. Hope you check out the recipe.
In this summer, I made plum, apricot, peach and blueberry syrup. All syrups left 1/3, so I eat them more slowly for autumn. 
I hate hot summer weather, but I like summer fruit. I wanna be with them more :)))

When I made ice chocolate latte, chocolate syrup was run out so I made. And homemade one is almost same as store bought. 
I just mixed water 1 : sugar 1 : cocoa powder 0.7 ratio and microwave 40 sec, and it turned out so well. I think I don’t need to buy chocolate syrup anymore XD


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf

🌙Menu
Plum ade : ice, slice of lemon, rosemary, plum syrup, soda water
Ice chocolate latte : ice, chocolate syrup, chocolate milk with coffee, lightly whipped heavy cream
Blueberry ade : slice of preserved lemon, ice, blueberries, blueberry syrup, soda water

+To make fruit syrup
-Shortcut : Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar and splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hour, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

snippet.title: What I Ate in August🍴 The Best French Toast, Bulgogi & Chilled Cucumber Soup | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello viewers, It’s Hailey.
In what I ate in August I’ll be showing you how to make the most best french toast and bulgogi & chilled cucumber soup (called oi-naengguk in Korean).

I’m not that like to eat rice. But at that time when I filmed this video, I was think like 
Oh It’s quite been a long time since I didn’t eat rice. 
So I made Korean cuisine meal, bulgogi and chilled cucumber soup.
I think bulgogi is quite well known kfood, but chilled cucumber soup is not.
This soup is usually eat hot summer like these days.
You may weird that clear-cold soup with rice, but not that bad as you think. 
If you don’t know what is wakame, it’s edible seaweed, called mi-yeok in Korean. 

French toast in this video is the best recipe ever in my life.
I always change when I make french toast for best ratio.
But this, it’s my final destination of french toast journey 😂
I think ratio was great, but that thick bread is important to make best recipe.
If you don’t like that sweet french toast, I think 4tsp of sugar is enough to make.

🌙Menu
+Bulgogi & Chilled Cucumber Soup(Oi-naengguk)
*Bulgogi
Ingredients : Ingredients : 250g(8.8oz) beef brisket, 1/2 onion, 1/2 leek, 30g(2Tbsp) soy sauce, 15g(1Tbsp) sugar, 15g(1Tbsp) mirim(rice wine), 20g(1Tbsp) minced garlic, 8g(1/2Tbsp) sesame seed oil, sesame seeds, ground pepper

1. Cut the beef to bite size, and cut onion and leek.
2. To make sauce, mix soy sauce, sugsr, mirim, minced garlic, sesame seed oil, sesame seeds and ground pepper.
3. Mix the beef and onion with sauce.
4. Frying bulgogi with greased pan. When the bulgogi turned almost cook. Turn off the heat, add leek into a pan.


*Chilled Cucumber Soup(Oi-naengguk)
Ingredients : 1 cucumber, handful of soaked wakame, 700ml(3cups) kelp-infused water, 17g(1Tbsp) salt, 60g(4Tbsp) sugar, 20g(4tsp) vinegar, red pepper, sesame seeds

Before you make: soak dried wakame into the water
1. Except middle of cucumber(seed part), slice thinly. Slice red pepper either.
2. Mix all ingredients together.
3. Put it in a fridge, serve when it is chilled.


+French Toast
Ingredients : 3 eggs, 90ml(1/3cup plus 2tsp) milk, 25g(5tsp) sugar, 5g(1tsp) vanilla extract, 1g(1/2tsp) ground cinnamon, unsalted butter, white bread, icing sugar, fruits

1.In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon. 
2.After soak the white breads into the egg mixture, frying on the buttered pan.
3.Decorate with icing sugar and fruit (optional).


🌙Music
A Rainy Day - Modoocom
Aux Bois- Modoocom

snippet.title: What I Ate in July🍴 Half&Half Korean Pancake, Natto Okonomiyaki, Golbaeng-i Muchim | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
안녕하세요 헤일리에요 :) 
7월의 월간 한끼 메뉴는 술안주! 를 주제로 잡아봤는데요! 술 뿐만 아니라, 그냥 야식이나 식사로 먹어도 맛있는 메뉴들로 준비해봤어요
이번달 메뉴는 골뱅이무침, 반반부침개 그리고 오꼬노미야끼에요

골뱅이무침은 제가 정말 좋아하는 안주류 중에 하나지만, 술집가서 먹으면 야채나 소면이 엄청 많은(…) 그 메뉴에요!
집에서 혼술 안주로도 딱이고, 그냥 먹어도 최고입니다 정말 :3
저는 이번 레시피에서 소면 대신 메밀면을 사용했는데요 메밀면 써도 괜찮았어요! (소면이 더 맛있긴함)

반반 부침개는 김치전 반, 부추전 반반으로 만들었어요.
영상을 보면 아시겠지만, 뒤집기를 정말 못해요… ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ
그리고 전치고 되게 두꺼운데, 두꺼운 전을 선호해서 두껍게 만들었으니 원하시면 더 얇게 맍드셔도 돼요.
저처럼 두껍게 만드시면 두장, 조금 더 얇게 만드시면 세장 정도 만드실 수 있어요.
소량 만드는거라, 부담없이 만드셔서 드실수있을꺼에요 :)
그리고 부침개 레시피에서 물은 꼭 120ml이 아니라, 대략적인 수치니 120ml정도 물을 떠둔 다음에 조금씩 농도를 보고 조절해가면서 만드시는걸 추천드려요. 약간 반죽이 흐르는정도!

나또 오꼬노미야끼는 이전에 따로 영상으로도 소개 해드린적이 있는 레시피에요.
7월 초에 영상을 올렸는데, 7월 안주 레시피와도 잘 어울리는것 같아 짧게 한번 준비해봤어요.
혹시 풀영상이 궁금하시다면, http://bit.ly/2K2uw7A 여기를 참고해주세요 :)


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Hailey’s Monthly Cafe June) : http://bit.ly/2KXujnn
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
 
 
🌙Menu
+Golbaeng-i muchim (spiced sea snail with veggies)
Ingredients : 1 can of golbaengi, 1/4 cucumber, 1/2 onion, cabbage, 1/4 carrot, sesame seeds, asian thin noodles or buckwheat noodles.
(Seasoning : 1 1/2Tbsp chili powder, 1Tbsp gochujang, 1/2Tbsp minced garlic, 1Tbsp sugar, 2Tbsp vinegar, 3Tbsp soy sauce, 2Tbsp mirin(rice wine), 2Tbsp oligosaccharide(or corn syrup), 2Tbsp sesame seed oil, 1/2Tbsp sesame)
 
1. 양념 재료를 모두 섞어주고, 메밀면(소면)은 미리 삶아줍니다.
2. 오이, 양파, 당근, 양배추를 적절한 크기로 잘라줍니다.
3. 골뱅이 캔에서 물과 골뱅이를 분리하고, 골뱅이와 잘라준 야채들에 양념을 넣어 섞어줍니다.
4. 메밀면(소면)과 골뱅이 무침을 한데 담아줍니다.
 
 
+haf & half Korean pancakes
Kimchi Pancakes : 1cup Kimchi, 1/4 onion, 100g buchim-garu(Korean pancake mix), 120ml water, 1/2Tbsp sugar
Chive Pancakes : 1/3 bunch of chive, 1/2 onion, 3 small octopus, 100g buchim-garu(Korean pancake mix), 120ml water
 
1. 김치전 : 자른 김치와 채썬 양파, 부침가루, 설탕을 넣고 물을 조금씩 부어가며 반죽을 해준다.
2. 부추전 : 부추는 적당한 크기로 잘라준 후, 채썬 양파와 자른 쭈꾸미, 부침가루를 넣고 물을 조금씩 부어가며 반죽을 해준다.
3. 팬에 기름을 두르고 반은 김치전, 반은 부추전 반죽을 올려둔 후 양 면이 노릇노릇 해질 때 까지 구워준다. 


+Natto okonomiyaki
Ingredients : 2 handfuls of bean sprouts, 1pack 'Pulmuone’ natto, chopped chives, 1cup Korean pancake mix, 1/3cup water, 1 egg, 2 slices chopped bacon, vegetable oil, okonomiyaki sauce, mayonnaise, katsuobushi

1. In a bowl, put Korean pancake mix, water and egg, and mix until well combined.
2. In the mixture, add bean sprouts, chopped chives, chopped bacon and natto.
3. Turn on the heat and grease the pan. Put okonomiyaki mixture and frying until slightly golden brown.
4. On well-frying okonomiyaki, put some okonomiyaki sauce and mayonnaise. And sprinkle one katsuobushi on top.


🌙Music
Airport Lounge - Youtube Music Library

snippet.title: What I Ate in June🍴 Chicken Frittata, Mango Banana Smoothie, Fried Dumpling w/ wing | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
안녕하세요! 월간한끼로 찾아뵙는 헤일리에요 :)
이번 월간한끼 메뉴로는 닭가슴살 프리타타, 망고 바나나 스무디볼, 날개 왕교자만두를 준비해봤어요

닭가슴살 프리타타랑 망고 바나나 스무디볼은 요즘 다이어트(?)를 한다고 나름 자주먹고있는 메뉴중 하나에요!
닭가슴살 프리타타는 든든하게 챙겨먹고 싶을때, 망고 바나나 스무디볼은 더울때 요리하기는 귀찮고, 그래도 챙겨먹어야할때! 이렇게 나뉘는것같아요

밑에 재료를 보시면 아시겠지만, 되게 건강한 재료들로 구성되어 있어서 정말! 한끼 든든하게 챙겨먹을수 있어 너무 좋아용 :)
닭가슴살 프리타타 옆에 있는 에이드는(따로 영상에서 먹지는 않았지만), 7월 카페영상에서 소개해드릴께요! 

그리고 망고 바나나 스무디볼은 망바스무디볼! 역시 스무디볼은 맛이없을수가 없죠 ㅠㅠ 망바 스무디볼에다가 화분(비폴렌)과 치아시드를 얹어서 오독오독한 식감을 살려줬어요! 물론 비폴렌은 꽃가루 알러지가 있으신분은 절대! 먹으면 안된답니다 ㅠㅠ

마지막은 이번달 컨셉같았던 다이어트 느낌이 전혀없는 날개 왕교자 만두에요 ㅋㅋㅋㅋ
월드컵시즌! 이제 정말 경기가 얼마남지 않았는데요 ㅠㅠ 오늘밤도 새벽3시 경기 꼭 챙겨보려고 합니다 ㅠㅠ 
아무튼! 저는 이번에 날개교자를 처음 만들어봤는데요, 다들 골든브라운이 될때까지 굽더지만 저는 그 특유의 하얀날개느낌이 좋아서 이렇게 만들었어요!
조금더 바삭바삭하게 드시려면 좀 더 구운담에 드시는거 추천!
옆에 맥주는 타이완맥주 파인애플맛/망고맛과 같이 먹어줬는데요, 두가지 종류다 맛있지만 저는 개인적으로 파인애플맛이 더 좋은것같아요 :3 도수도 낮고 달달하니까 한번 드셔보는거 추천!

snippet.title: Natto Okonomiyaki 나또 오꼬노미야끼 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello viewers, it’s Hailey. 
Today’s menu is natto okonomiyaki.
In these days, many people are spend the time for watch World Cup 2018. Especially in Korea, most of the games are in midnight. So lods of people are watching the game with midnight snack and beer. 

So, this video, I made more healthier version of midnight snack. If you guys don’t know, natto is fermented food from Japan. And natto is known for healthy food in your body.

I use bean sprout for this recipe, if you want to make like more original, substitute to shredded cabbage.
Hope you like this video, and I’ll see you in next video :)

snippet.title: What I Ate in May🍴 : All About Brunch / Naengmyeon, Egg Mayo Toast, Avocado Toast | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello viewers, I’m back again with what I ate in May.
I prepared 3 types of food again, it is kimchi-naengmyeon, egg mayo toast and avocado toast.
I ate a lot of toasts in this month. I like toast so much, but I think i need to try more various foods.

Kimchi-Naengmyeon is one of my favorite Korean foods.
Naengmyeon means cold(‘naeng’ in Korean) + noodle(‘myron’ in Korean).
It may sounds little bit strange I guess, cold noodle.
But I love to eat this naengmyeon especially in summer.
This kimchi-naengmyeon from ‘Ourhome’ taste so good, so I eat once a week at least.
If you can find this, I really recommend to try it.

Egg mayo toast was on a trend at 2017, in Korea. 
It is really easy recipe but you know, it looks so good even if only seeing this recipe.
And maybe you think why my color of bread is green. I add mugwort powder when i made that bread.

This avocado toast is reminds me guacamole. Avocado and tomatoes, sooo nice combination.
I bought avocado just before I film this one. But it ripened just right. (yayyy)

snippet.title: What I Ate in April 🍴 : Avocado Salad, Tteokbokki, BLT Sandwich | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello viewers, It’s Hailey!
I didin’t upload what I ate in march, so I combine with april. 

This tteobokki recipe is one of my FAVORITE recipe.
It’s actually similar taste with Korean tteobokki restaurant, ‘shinjeon tteobokki(신전떡볶이)’.
They are selling that fried fish cake, and it taste amazing. If you don’t like fish cake, than I really recommend to try this. It will change your mind (I hope..)!
My cabbage was very sweet, so it was perfect to add 5Tbsp of sugar.
But if you don’t like vegetables or cabbage, add 6Tbsp of sugar will be fine.

Avocado salad is inspired by McDonald’s. 
They don’t sell salads in Korea, so in Winter Olympic, it was my first try to eat salad in McDonald's.
It was really simple ingredients but taste just really great. So I thought I need to share with my viewers!(And of course, I make this A LOT)

I’ll come back in June(or end of May) with what I ate in May!
I hope you liked this video! :)

snippet.title: 3 Easy Recipes for Christmas Vlog🎄 : 2 No-Bake, 1 Baked Recipes | Macarons, Icebox Cake, Pudding
snippet.description:
이 영상은 라메르 풀라르의 유료광고를 포함하고 있습니다.
This video is sponsored by LA MÉRE POULARD

안녕하세요! 스위트헤일리에요 :)

영상에 짧게 소개드렸던 🎄선물 이벤트🎄에 관해 설명 드릴게요!
-기간 : 2020년 12월 09일 수요일 ~ 12월 13일 일요일 까지
-참여 방법 : #Thankyoucookie 올 한 해 가장 감사했던 분, 그리고 그 순간을 아래 댓글로 공유 해 주세요. 그리고 더불어 제게 하고싶은 말이 있으시다면 남겨주시길 부탁드려요 :) 댓글에는 꼭 이메일도 함께 남겨주세요. (이메일이 없으면 연락드리기 어렵습니다 ㅠㅠ)
-꼭 자주 확인하시는 이메일을 남겨주세요‼️
-This giveaway is only shipping in Korea only. I'll do the international giveaway in future😭

라메르 풀라르 쿠키는 뚜레쥬르, 매크로온 사이트, 마켓컬리, 쿠팡, 백화점, 카카오톡 쇼핑에서 쉽게 만날 수 있어요. 특히, 뚜레쥬르에서는 사브레 쿠키 틴 (500g)과 팔렛 초코 틴(500g)을 만나보실 수 있으니 연말 선물로 준비해보세요!
아래 링크에서는 다양한 쿠키를 만나보실 수 있답니다 😊
https://bit.ly/3pCsl0g


/ BANANA PUDDING 바나나 푸딩 /
우유 240g milk
설탕 38g sugar
소금 한꼬집 Pinch of salt
전분 13g starch
바닐라 익스트랙7g vanilla extract
계란 노른자 3 egg yolks
무염버터 22g unsalted butter, room temp
바나나 1 banana
라메르 풀라르 레몬 팔렛 LA MÉRE POULARD Palets Citron 

1. Pour the milk into the pot, and heat up the milk in medium heat.
2. Put sugar, salt, starch, vanilla extract, and egg yolks into the bowl, whisk until well combined. While mixing, pour the hot milk slowly.
3. Put the egg yolk mixture back into the pot, and gently stir for 1~2min in medium heat. lower the heat to low, and stir an additional 1~2min. Turn off the heat, add unsalted butter and mix well.
4. Transfer the custard cream into the bowl, and wrap the custard. Make sure the plastic wrap can touch the surface of the custard cream (It prevents harden the surface). Keep it in the fridge for at least 1 hour.
5. When the custard cream is fully chilled, In a pudding container, place custard cream, 00, and chopped bananas as much as you want. Refrigerate up to 2 hours.


/ LA MERE POULARD ICEBOX CAKE 비스코프 아이스박스 케이크 / 
생크림 400ml heavy cream
비스코프 스프레드 60g biscoff spread
연유 30g condensed milk
라메르풀라르 그란데 갈레트 LA MÉRE POULARD grandes galettes pur beurre

1. 휘핑기를 이용해 생크림을 2분간 고속으로 휘핑 해 줍니다. 비스코프 스프레드를 넣고 30초~1분간 휘핑 해 줍니다. 그리고 연유를 넣고, 스패출러로 잘 섞어줍니다.
2. 팬을 랩으로 감싸줍니다. 크림을 바닥과 옆면 부분을 발라준 다음, 00을 팬 가 부분부터 세워서 채워줍니다. 각 쿠키마다 크림을 발라주고, 팬이 가득 찰 때까지 반복 해 줍니다. 팬이 다 찼으면 윗면을 크림으로 덮어줍니다. 냉장고에서 최소 2시간 동안 휴지합니다. 남은 크림도 냉장보관 해 줍니다.
3. 팬에서 분리해준 다음, 남은 크림을 이용해 장식 해 줍니다.

1. Using an electronic mixer, whip the heavy cream, for 2min at high speed. Add biscoff spread, and whip for 30sec~1min. And add condensed milk, fold with a spatula until well combined.
2. Cover the pan with plastic wrap. Spread the cream in the bottom and side of the pan. Place the cookies vertically. Spread the cream on each of the cookies, and repeat until there’s no gap inside the pan. When it filled, cover the top of the cookies with cream. Refrigerate for 2 hours at least. Store the leftover cream in the fridge.
3. Take out from the pan, decorate with leftover cream.


/ COOKIE MACARONS 쿠키마카롱 /
계란흰자 64g egg whites
설탕 61g sugar
아몬드 가루 77g almond flour
슈가파우더 77g icing sugar

빨강&초록 식용색소 Red & green food coloring
크렘앙글레즈 Creme anglaise (anglaise buttercream)
라메르풀라르 애플카라멜 쿠키 LA MÉRE POULARD cookies pomme-caramel
라메르풀라르 올초콜릿 쿠키 LA MÉRE POULARD tout chocolat 

1. Put egg whites in a bowl and whip. When the egg white starts to foam, add sugar divided into 3 times while whipping. Whisk until the meringue turns shiny and doesn’t fell off when you turn upside down the bowl. 
2. In meringue, add sieved almond flour and icing sugar, and mix gently. Divide the batter in half, add the red and green food coloring each of the batter. Fold gently until falls into a stair shape and the stair-shaped mark lasts 6~8sec when you dropped the batter from the spatula.
3. Transfer the batter into the piping bag, and squeeze it onto the baking sheet. Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius(355 degrees Fahrenheit), and bake at 150 degrees Celsius(300 degrees Fahrenheit) for 15min. When it’s come out the oven cools down completely.
4. Crush the cookies into small pieces. Place your favorite buttercream (I used Creme Anglais) on the flat side of the macaron, place the crushed cookies on top of that, and cover with another macaron

snippet.description:

🌙Menu
Fig ade : fig syrup, ice, lemon, fig, sparkling water, thyme(herb)
Peach latte : homemade canned peach, ice, milk(+milk foam)
Fig yogurt : homemade granola(video will upload soon!), yogurt, fig, diced apple, thyme(herb)
Pong crush(jollypong smoothie) : jollypong smoothie(1/2cup milk, jollypong, 5 ice cubes), jollypong, vanilla ice cream, lavender(herb)

+To make a fruit syrup
-Fast : Cut the fruits into small sizes. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide, etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar, and a splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small sizes. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hours, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

Eng recipe will update soon!

1. 피클을 먼저 만들어 줍니다; 오이와 무, 당근을 두께감 있는 골패썰기를 해줍니다. 그릇에 페페론치노, 사과식초, 설탕, 소금을 넣고 잘 섞어준 다음, 썰어둔 야채를 넣고 골고루 섞어준 다음 최소 30분 이상 냉장고에서 숙성시켜줍니다.
2. 돼지불고기에 피쉬소스, 간장, 다진마늘, 설탕을 넣고 잘 버무려줍니다. 약 10분간 실온에서 숙성시켜줍니다.
3. 스리라차소스, 마요네즈, 레몬즙, 꿀을 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
4. 후라이팬에 식용유를 두르고 계란 2개를 넣어준 다음 스크램블 에그를 만들어 줍니다.
5. 다시 후라이팬에 식용유를 두른 다음, 양념에 재워둔 고기를 구워줍니다. 소스가 다 졸아들 때 까지 구워줍니다.
6. 베트남 쌀 바게트의 가운데를 잘라준 다음, 속을 약간 파내줍니다. 소스를 골고루 발라주고, 피클-스크램블에그-돼지고기 순으로 올려준 다음 고수를 이용해 장식해줍니다. 남은 피클과 함께 드셔주세요!

snippet.title: What I eat in a day : Pork ribs, muesli and ice cream | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
안녕하세요 :) 이번 영상은 집밥일기, 하루 식단일기를 담아봤어요

아침으로는 뮤즐리와 요거트, 아메리카노를 같이 즐겼어요
개인적으로 제일 좋아하는 요거트 브랜드인 액티비아와, 뮤즐리도 저번에 홈플러스에서 구매하고 맛있어서 종류별로 사먹고 있는 뮤즐리에요.


이번 영상은 홈플러스와 함께 제작하였는데요, 현재 홈플러스에서 22주년 맞이 행사를 하고 있어요~!
홈플러스에서 판매 품목들을 저렴하게 구매할 수 있고, 또 홈플튜버를 모집하고 있어서 다들 지원해보셨음 좋겠어요!

홈플튜버는 홈플러스와 함꼐 ‘홈플러스’를 주제로 한 영상 콘텐츠를 제작하는 유튜버에요.
모집기간은 3월 1일부터 24일까지니 아직 2주 조금 안되게 남았으니 꼭꼭 참여해보시길 바래요!
참여방법은 홈플러스 매장을 방문하여, 창립 22주년 행사상품들을 활용한 영상을 촬영해서 유튜브에 올리고, 지원서를 작성하면 끝!
저처럼 홈플러스에서 판매중인 PB제품들과 다양한 제품들을 이용해서 요리 영상을 간단하게 찍어도 된다고 하니 꼭꼭! 좋은 행사 참여해보세요 :)
게다가 총 1000만원 이상의 지원금을 제공한다니 너무너무 좋지요 *-*
이 외에 자세한 정보와 링크는 http://bit.ly/2J7t6xk 여기서 참고해주세요🥰

홈플러스에서 구매했다는 점 이외에 따로 제품 홍보는 없으니 편안하게 시청하셨으면 좋겠어요 :)
그리고 정말 세일을 많이 해서, 3월 한달 동안은 홈플러스에서 쭉 쇼핑할까봐요! 특히 폭립이 너무 맛있어서 또 해먹으려구요!

snippet.title: Home Cafe January☕️ Pink Hot Chocolate, Strawberry Apple Tea, Chocolate Latte | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey again :)
For first month of 2019, I made pink hot chocolate, strawberry apple tea and chocolate latte.
You guys may know, I made chocolate latte a lot.
For make choc latte, you need chocolate syrup. If the reason why you go to cafe is for grab a choc latte, stop buying it.
You can make chocolate latte at home!
It taste like same as store bought one😆
If you want to see how to make, check out monthly home cafe September’s description box! (http://bit.ly/2OggssW)
It’s my go-to recipe! Please try it 😊
Strawberry apple tea is literally ’strawberry apple’ tea.
I used strawberry apple syrup, which I made, and some hot water.
You can use hot water like me, but using fruit flavored tea also good! It’ll get more fruity flavor. Or you can use soda water etc.
For make strawberry apple syrup, check out how to make fruit syrup down below 🙂
I love pink or red-ish color on foods, so I made pink hot chocolate!
Actually it made with plain white chocolate. I just add some red food coloring in it.
You can use strawberry flavored pink chocolate, but I used white chocolate because I like its own white choc flavor.
To make this, simmer with white chocolate, red food coloring and milk on the pot.
I don’t have specific measurement, because you know, sometimes craving more sweet, but sometimes it’s not.😂
On top of drink, I put some shredded pink chocolate. Of course, you don’t have to. You can put some lightly whipped cream if you want, but for me, I’m not fan of put whipped cream on white hot chocolate.😂

Hope you like this video,
And happy lunar new year! :)

🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Hailey’s Monthly Cafe December) : http://bit.ly/2Scrt5x
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

 
 
🌙Menu
+Chocolate latte
Ice, chocolate syrup, milk, strong coffee, lightly whipped cream(with sugar)
+Strawberry apple tea
Preserved strawberry & apple syrup, hot water, rosemary
+Pink hot chocolate
White chocolate, red food coloring, milk, shredded pink chocolate

+To make fruit syrup
-Shortcut : Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar, and a splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hours, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

snippet.title: Singapore Chilli Crab 🌶🦀 싱가포르 칠리크랩 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey :) Today’s recipe is Singapore Chilli Crab.

In this recipe, i used store-bought chilli crab paste, brand ‘prima taste’. In Korea, you can find quite easily in any grocery store. Or if you go to Singapore, it’s in everywhere! (i think)

I didn’t follow the instruction perfectly, but it was really good😂😂 Of course, eat chilli crab in Singpore is best option. But like me, who miss the taste of Singapore, you will love this!
I used blue crab and shrimp for this. Blue crab is the easiest crab to find in Korea. If i can found big one, i would use that😭

In the instructions, they used peanut oil. But i didn’t have it and couldn’t found easily, so I used just plain normal veggie oil. And it turns out great!

And with this chilli crab, i ate whit spring onion-egg fired rice, which you can find easily in Chinese cuisine (or some other countries nearby).
For make this, put a veggie oil in a pan on medium-high heat. and put the chopped spring onion and garlic. Frying for about minute or so. and put the cooked rice and frying again. Season with salt and pepper.


**Some might be ‘what the hack’ that what i did to the crab…😂
Actually, it was my first time to cut the crab. I knew i was wrong while is eating this😅 But good thing is I can eat the fried rice in that crab shell better than clean cutting one!
But i think i have to make another video with crab, because now i know how to cut crabs😂


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!
 

🌙Ingredients
vegetable oil
2 crabs
5~6 shrimps
470ml water
chilli crab paste
chilli crab premix
30ml water, for chilli crab premix
2 eggs, lightly beaten
coriander leaves

prima taste - Singapore Chilli Crab

1. In a pan, drizzle the vegetable oil and put crabs and shrimps. Cover the lid and cook for about 2~3min on a medium to high heat, until crabs and shrimps are cooked. When it’s cooked, transfer the seafoods to the another bowl
2. Put the chilli crab sauce on a pan and mix on a medium heat. And put the seafoods again and mix well. Pour the water and cover the lid, until water is boiling..
3. Mix the chilli crab premix with water and pour onto the pan. Mix nicely.
4. Beat the egg and pour the eggs. Mix again and remove form heat. Serve with coriander leaves.

Hello viewers, It’s Hailey again :)

Vanilla ice americano is sooo much huge right? 😂
This month, I had so much work to do. So I almost slept 3~4 hours per a day for about week or so. This coffee was lifesaver to me😭
For make vanilla syrup, add 160ml(2/3cup), 100g(1/2cup) sugar, and 1/2 to 1 vanilla bean into the pan and boil until all sugar is melted. Store in fridge until use.

snippet.title: No-Bake twisted donuts, Chapssal-Gwabaegi(Kwabaegi) :  Korean Street Food Recipe 찹쌀꽈배기 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
11~12 gwabaegies 

-찹쌀꽈배기 chapssal-gwabaegi(twisted buns)
우유 230ml(1cup minus 2tsp) warm milk
인스턴트 드라이 이스트 6g(1+1/2tsp) instant dry yeast
설탕 26g(2Tbsp) sugar
강력분 210g(1+1/2cups) bread flour
찹쌀가루 110g(2/3cup) glutinous rice flour
소금 4g(1/2tsp) salt
식용유 15g(1Tbsp) vegetable oil

-카스테라 꽈배기 castlla ver
카스테라 castella
딸기잼 / 라즈베리잼 berry jam

-설탕꽈배기 cinnamon sugar ver
설탕 sugar
시나몬가루 ground cinnamon


[햇방아] 찹쌀가루: https://bit.ly/3eycOKs
[사프]인스턴트 드라이이스트(레드/125g): https://bit.ly/32Wal6W
[쥬에그]딸기잼: https://bit.ly/3vnsCWV
[브레드가든]계피가루(시나몬가루): https://bit.ly/3dWQcUT


1. 따뜻한 우유에 인스턴트 드라이 이스트, 설탕을 넣고 저어준 다음, 5분간 불려줍니다.
2. 강력분, 찹쌀가루, 소금과 우유-이스트 혼합물, 식용유를 넣고 13~15분간 손반죽을 해줍니다. 반죽이 매끈해질때까지 반죽 후, 랩을 씌운 다음 실온에서 2시간 동안 발효해줍니다.
3. 50~60g씩 반죽을 나눈 다음, 손으로 소분한 반죽을 잡은 손목과 손날을 바닥에 붙인 채 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 둥글리기한 반죽은 실온에서 15분간 발효해줍니다.
4. 반죽을 길게 밀어줍니다(25~30cm, 10~11inches). 반죽의 양 끝을 손바닥으로 가볍게 잡고, 양 끝을 반대방향으로 밀어줍니다. 반죽 양 끝을 잡고 반죽을 위로 올려 꽈배기모양을 만듭니다. 꽈배기 모양이 풀리지 않도록 양 끝을 꼬집어 고정시켜줍니다.
5. 성형한 반죽은 1시간 가량 실온에서 발효시켜줍니다.
6. 기름을 섭씨 180도(화씨 355도)까지 올려준 다음, 꽈배기 색이 노릇해질때까지 튀겨줍니다. 완성된 꽈배기는 식힘망에 적당히 식혀줍니다.

-카스테라 꽈배기
1. 카스테라를 체를 이용해 곱게 가루내줍니다. 
2. 꽈배기에 딸기잼 혹은 라즈베리잼을 바른 다음, 카스테라 가구를 발라 완성해줍니다.

-설탕 꽈배기
1. 설탕과 시나몬가루 적당량을 섞어줍니다. 
2. 완성된 꽈배기를 설탕 시나몬 가루에 돌돌 굴려 완성해줍니다.


1. Add instant dry yeast and sugar to warm milk, stir, and soak for 5 minutes.
2. Add bread flour, glutinous rice powder, salt and milk-yeast mixture, and vegetable oil and hand knead for 13~15 minutes. Knead the dough until smooth. Cover it with a wrap, and let it rise at room temperature for 2 hours.
3. After dividing the dough by 50~60g, and make a the dough into the ball shape while holding the subdivided dough by palm and attaching the hand blade to the floor. Let it rise at room temperature for 15 minutes.
4. Roll the dough into the long string (25~30cm, 10~11inches). Gently hold both ends of the dough with your palms, and push both ends in opposite directions. Hold both ends of the dough and put the dough up to make a twisted shape. Pinching both ends so as not to loosen the shape of the donuts.
5. Let the dough rise at room temperature for about 1 hour.
6. Heat the oil to 180 degrees Celsius (355 degrees Fahrenheit) and fry until the color of the donuts turns golden brown. Cool the finished donut in a cooling rack.

-Castella Ggwabaegi(twisted donuts)
1. Finely powder the castella with a sieve.
2. After applying strawberry jam or raspberry jam to the donut, apply castella powder to finish.

-Sugar Ggwabaegi(twisted donuts)
1. Mix sugar and cinnamon powder.
2. Roll the donuts in sugar cinnamon mixture to finish.

snippet.title: Matcha Custard Cream Donuts Recipe : 녹차 크림도넛 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS 재료 / 
10~11개 도넛 분량
10~11 donuts

*브리오슈 도넛
설탕 33g(2+1/2Tbsp) sugar
따뜻한 물 125ml(1/2cup plus 1tsp) warm water
인스턴트 드라이 이스트 10g(2+1/2tsp) instant dry yeast
계란 2 eggs
강력분  350g(2+1/2cups) bread flour
레몬제스트 ~1g(1/2tsp) lemon zest
소금 5g(2/3tsp) salt
무염버터, 실온 67g(5Tbsp) unsalted butter, softened

여분의 강력분 extra bread flour
코팅용 설탕 sugar for coating

*말차 커스터드 크림
계란 3 eggs
박력분 30g(3Tbsp) cake flour
설탕 133g(2/3cup) sugar
바닐라 익스트랙 5g(1tsp) vanilla extract
우유 350ml(1+1/3cups plus 2Tbsp) milk
무염버터 37g(3Tbsp) unsalted butter
말차가루 20g(3Tbsp) matcha powder

생크림 120g(1/2cup) heavy cream
설탕 15g(1Tbsp) sugar

🤍[엘르앤비르] 고메버터(500g): https://bit.ly/3eGvNnN
🤍[고씨곳간]제주산 유기농말차가루: https://bit.ly/3tnYcTG
🤍[브레드가든]인스턴트 드라이이스트: https://bit.ly/3rTXkpi

/ INSTRUCTIONS 만드는 법 /
-브리오슈 도넛
1. Put warm water, instant yeast, and sugar in a cup, mix well, and let it sit for 10 minutes. Prepare lemon zest by grate the lemon.
2. Put the bread flour, egg, salt, and yeast mixture together in a bowl. Knead by hand for 2~3 minutes and clump them together, but until there is a little flour left. Add butter and hand knead for 17~20 minutes until the dough is soft and shiny (especially in winter, it needs to be kneaded longer). If kneading for more than 15 minutes continues but still sticky, add 1 teaspoon of flour at a time and knead until soft and shiny. Cover it and let it rise in the refrigerator for 12~18 hours, or in a warm place for 2 hours.
*Note: It's okay to use a stand mixer
3. Punch down to remove air bubbles from the dough, divide the dough into 70g(2.4oz, about 11 pieces). Put the dough on the table and round it with your wrists and fingertips on the table. Make a ball of all the remaining dough.
4. Spread out the rounded dough into a flat circle shape using your palm or a rolling pin. Let them rise the dough at room temperature for about 2 hours.
5. Put cooking oil on medium-low heat until 180~190 Degrees Celsius(355~375 Degrees Fahrenheit) for 5-6 minutes. When the temperature is reached, reduce to low heat and fry the donuts. Fry each side for 1 minute and 30 seconds to 2 minutes until golden brown. Cool the fried donuts on a cooling rack.

1. 컵에 따뜻한 물, 이스트, 설탕을 넣고 잘 섞어준 다음, 10분동안 불려줍니다. 깨끗하게 씻은 레몬을 강판에 갈아 레몬 제스트를 준비합니다.
2. 그릇에 강력분, 계란, 소금, 이스트 혼합물을 함께 넣어줍니다. 2~3분간 손반죽을 해 한 덩이로 뭉치지만 밀가루가 약간 남아있는 상태까지 반죽해주세요. 버터를 넣고, 반죽이 부드럽고 윤기가 돌 때까지 17~20분간 손반죽 해줍니다 (특히 겨울철에는 오래 반죽해야해요). 15분 이상 반죽해도 계속 질다면 1작은술 가량씩 밀가루를 추가로 넣고 질지 않을 때까지 반죽해주세요. 랩을 씌워주고, 냉장고에서 12~18시간동안 발효 혹은 2시간 동안 따뜻한 곳에서 발효 해 줍니다(1차발효).
*참고 : 스탠드 믹서를 사용해도 괜찮아요
3. 반죽의 기포를 빼준 다음, 반죽을 70g(2.4oz, 11개 정도)로 나누어줍니다. 반죽을 테이블에 올려 손목과 손 끝을 테이블에 댄 상태로 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 남은 반죽 전부 둥글리기를 하여 준비해줍니다.
4. 둥글리기 한 반죽은 손바닥 혹은 밀대를 이용해 납작한 원 모양으로 펼쳐줍니다. 완성된 반죽은 실온에서 2시간 가량 발효해줍니다.
5. 식용유를 5-6분간 섭씨 180~190도(화씨 355~375도)가 될 때까지 중약불에 올려줍니다. 온도에 도달하면 약불로 줄여준 다음, 도넛을 튀겨줍니다. 골든브라운색(황금색)이 될 때까지, 각 면을 1분 30초~2분간 튀겨줍니다. 다 튀겨진 도넛은 식힘망 위에서 식혀줍니다.

-말차 커스터드 크림
1. In a bowl or cup, add soft flour, sugar, vanilla extract, egg yolk, and matcha powder. Mix well. If it is too thick, pour in milk little by little and mix until it is no lumps.
2. Heat the remaining milk over low heat. When the outer part of the pot starts to boil, remove it from the heat.
3. Pour the milk into the egg yolk mixture. Continue stirring while pouring the milk. Transfer it back to the pot and put it on low heat. Mix well and cook for 6 to 8 minutes until the custard cream is thickened.
4. When the cream becomes thick, take it off the heat, then add unsalted butter and mix well. Cover the custard cream with plastic wrap. Make sure the surface of the custard cream touches the wrap. Otherwise, the outer part will be getting harden. Let it rest in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours.
5. Whisk the whipped cream and sugar until stiff peak. Then add cold custard cream and mix lightly. Transfer it to a piping bag.

1. 그릇 혹은 컵에 박력분, 설탕, 바닐라 익스트랙, 계란노른자와 말차가루를 넣습니다. 잘 섞어줍니다. 너무 되직하면 우유를 조금씩 부어주며 섞어주세요.
2. 남은 우유를 약불에서 데워줍니다. 냄비의 겉 부분이 끓어오르기 시작하면 불에서 내려주세요.
3. 우유를 계란노른자 혼합물에 부어줍니다. 우유를 부어줄 동안 계속 저어줍니다. 다시 냄비로 옮겨준 다음, 약불에 올려줍니다. 커스터드 크림이 되직해 질 때까지 6~8분간 잘 섞어주며 익혀줍니다.
4. 크림이 되직해지면 불에서 내려준 다음, 무염버터를 넣어주고 잘 섞어줍니다. 완성된 커스터드 크림은 랩을 씌워줍니다. 커스터드 크림의 표면이 랩에 닿도록 해 주세요. 아니면 겉 부분이 딱딱하게 굳게됩니다. 냉장고에서 최소 3시간 동안 휴지시켜줍니다.
5. 생크림과 설탕을 단단한 뿔이 생길 때까지 휘핑 해줍니다. 그리고 차가운 커스터드 크림을 넣고 가볍게 섞어줍니다. 짤주머니에 옮겨담아줍니다.

-말차 커스터드 도넛 완성하기
1. Make a hole in the donut with chopsticks to make a place for the cream.
2. Lightly roll the donut in sugar.
3. Fill the matcha custard cream into the donut.
4. Store the finished donuts at room temperature and eat them within a day.

1. 도넛에 젓가락을 이용해 구멍을 내어 크림이 들어갈 자리를 만들어줍니다.
2. 도넛을 설탕에 가볍게 굴려줍니다.
3. 도넛에 완성된 말차 커스터드 크림을 넣고 채워 완성해줍니다.
4. 완성된 도넛은 실온 보관으로, 하루 이내에 섭취해줍니다.


/ SUBSCRIBE /  http://bit.ly/SweetHailey 
/ INSTAGRAM / @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
/ BLOG / http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

snippet.title: Milky Cream Donuts Recipe : Condensed milk whipped cream 우유도넛 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
-12 donuts
-도넛 12개

*Donuts 도넛
따뜻한 물 75g(1/3cup minus 1tsp) lukewarm water
강력분 350g(2 3/4cup plus 1Tbsp) bread flour
설탕 30g(2Tbsp) sugar
소금 5g(1/2tsp) salt
인스턴트 이스트 4g(1tsp) instant yeast
계란 2 eggs
말랑한 상태의 무염버터 65g(4 1/2Tbsp) unsalted butter(softened)

*Condensed whipped cream 연유크림
생크림 500ml(2cups plus 2Tbsp) heavy cream
크림치즈 40g(4tsp) cream cheese
설탕 45g(3Tbsp) sugar
연유 80ml(5 1/2Tbsp) condensed milk

슈가파우더 Icing sugar

1. In a bowl, put bread flour, sugar, salt, instant yeast, eggs, and warm water. 
Knead for 2~3 min, it came out one dough but a little bit of flour is still left, Add butter, and knead again until the dough is smooth and shiny, for 17~20min. (Especially in wintertime). Wrap the dough, and leave it for 1hour~1hour half min in a warm place.
*note : you can use a stand mixer to make.
2. Punch down the dough to release the air, and divide the dough into 50g(1.7oz, 12 donuts). To shape into balls, place the ball on the work surface and rest the side of your hand next to it so your palm and fingers are cupped around it. Do the same process on the rest of the dough.
3. Roll out the ball-shaped dough into a flat round shape. Place onto the 11.5cm(4.5inch) square parchment paper. Let it rise for 2 hours in room temp.
4. While doughs getting a rise, we’re gonna prepare the whipped cream. Place heavy cream, sugar, and cream cheese into the bowl, and whip until it gets soft peak, about 2-3min. And add condensed milk, and whip until it gets a stiff peak. Transfer into the piping bag and store it in the fridge until use.
5. Heat the cooking oil, about 180-200C / 365~400F, about 6m in medium-low heat. When the oil reaches that heat, turn the heat to low. Frying them until getting golden brown, I fried for 1min 30sec~2min for each side. After frying, chill in a cooling rack. 
7. With a knife, slice the donut in half but leave the edge of the donut. Fill the cream with a spatula or spoon. Sprinkle some icing sugar to finish.

1. 그릇에 박력분, 설탕, 소금, 인스턴트 이스트, 따뜻한 물을 넣어줍니다. 2~3분간 손반죽을 해 한 덩이로 뭉치지만 밀가루가 약간 남아있는 상태까지 반죽해주세요. 버터를 넣고, 반죽이 부드럽고 윤기가 돌 때까지 17~20분간 손반죽 해줍니다 (특히 겨울철에는 오래 반죽해야해요). 랩을 씌워주고, 1시간에서 1시간 반 동안 따뜻한 곳에서 발효 해 줍니다.
*참고 : 스탠드 믹서를 사용해도 괜찮아요
2. 반죽의 기포를 빼준 다음, 반죽을 50g(1.7oz, 12개 정도)로 나누어줍니다. 반죽을 테이블에 올려 손목과 손 끝을 테이블에 댄 상태로 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 남은 반죽 전부 둥글리기를 하여 준비해줍니다.
3. 둥글리기를 한 반죽을 밀대를 이용해 납작한 원 모양으로 펼쳐줍니다. 11.5cm(4.5inch) 정사각형 크기로 자른 유산지 위에 올려준 다음, 실온에서 2시간 동안 발효시켜줍니다.
4. 도넛 반죽이 발효될 동안, 휘핑크림을 준비해줍니다. 그릇에 생크림, 설탕, 크림치즈를 넣어준 다음, 2~3분간 부드러운 뿔이 설때까지 고속으로 휘핑해줍니다. 연유를 넣어준 다음, 단단한 뿔이 설 때까지 휘핑 해 줍니다. 짤주머니에 옮겨담은 후, 사용하기 전 까지 냉장보관해줍니다.
6. 식용유를 5-6분간 180-200C / 365-400F가 될 때까지 중약불에 올려줍니다. 온도에 도달하면 약불로 줄여준 다음, 도넛을 튀겨줍니다. 골든브라운색(황금색)이 될 때까지, 각 면을 1분 30초~2분간 튀겨줍니다. 다 튀겨진 도넛은 식힘망 위에서 식혀줍니다.
7. 칼을 이용해 도넛을 반으로 갈라줍니다. 끝부분은 살짝 남기고 반으로 갈라주세요. 크림을 스패출러나 스푼으로 채워줍니다. 슈가파우더를 위에 뿌려 완성해주세요.

/ BLOG / http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

snippet.title: Raspberry Cream Donuts Recipe 라즈베리 크림 도넛 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
*donuts (12 donuts)
따뜻한 물 75g(1/3cup minus 1tsp) lukewarm water
강력분 350g(2 3/4cup plus 1Tbsp) bread flour
설탕 30g(2Tbsp) sugar
소금 5g(1/2tsp) salt
인스턴트 이스트 4g(1tsp) instant yeast
계란 2 eggs
말랑한 상태의 무염버터 65g(4 1/2Tbsp) unsalted butter(softened)

*raspberry cream (for 6 donuts)
라즈베리(산딸기) 잼 혹은 퓨레 90g(6T) raspberry jam or puree
생크림 320g(1 1/4cups) heavy cream
설탕 30g(2T) sugar

설탕 (90g)6T sugar
장식용 냉동 혹은 생 라즈베리 Extra fresh or frozen raspberry for decor

식용유 Cooking oil


1. In a bowl, put bread flour, sugar, salt, instant yeast, eggs, and lukewarm water. Using a stand mixer, knead in medium-low speed, until it came out in one dough, about 2 min.
2. While set at low speed, add softened unsalted butter, 15g(1Tbsp) at a time. When all butter is combined, set to medium speed, until dough is smooth and shiny, about 12-15min using stand mixer. Wrap the bowl, and let it rise for 1-2 hours until double in size. 
*note: if you don’t have a stand mixer, you can make by your hand :)
3. Punch down the dough to release the air, and divide the dough into 50g(1.7oz, 12 donuts). To shape into balls, place ball on the work surface and rest the side of your hand next to it so your palm and fingers are cupped around it. Do the same process on the rest of the dough.
4. Roll out the ball-shaped doughs into a flat round shape. Place onto the 11.5cm(4.5inch) square parchment paper. Let it rise for 2 hours in room temp.
5. While doughs getting rise, we’re gonna prepare raspberry cream. Place heavy cream, sugar, and raspberry jam into the bowl, and whip until it gets stiff peak, about 3-4min. Transfer into the piping bag and store it in the fridge until use.
6. Heat the cooking oil, about 180-200C / 365~400F, about 6m in medium-low heat. When oil reach on that heat, turn the heat to low. Frying them until getting golden brown, I fried for 1min 30sec~2min for each side. After frying, chill in a cooling rack. After that, roll the donuts in sugar. 
7. With a chopstick or reusable straw, etc.. make a hole to give some space for raspberry cream. And Fill the donuts with raspberry cream, which made earlier. Decorate with raspberry to each donut.

1. 그릇에 박력분, 설탕, 소금, 인스턴트 이스트, 따뜻한 물을 넣어줍니다. 스탠드 믹서에서 2분간 한덩이로 뭉칠 때 까지 중-저속으로 돌려줍니다.
2. 저속으로 스탠드믹서를 설정한 다음, 말랑한 상태의 버터를 1큰술씩 넣어가며 돌려줍니다. 버터가 완전히 섞이게 되면 중속으로 올려 12-15분간 반죽이 매끄럽고 부드러워 질 때까지 돌려줍니다. 그리고 랩을 씌운 다음 1-2시간 동안 반죽이 두배로 부풀 때 까지 실온에서 발효시켜줍니다.
*참고: 스탠드믹서가 없다면 손으로 하셔도 만드실 수 있어요
3. 반죽의 기포를 빼준 다음, 반죽을 50g(1.7oz, 12개 정도)로 나누어줍니다. 반죽을 테이블에 올려 손목과 손 끝을 테이블에 댄 상태로 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 남은 반죽 전부 둥글리기를 하여 준비해줍니다.
4. 둥글리기를 한 반죽을 밀대를 이용해 납작한 원 모양으로 펼쳐줍니다. 11.5cm(4.5inch) 정사각형 크기로 자른 유산지 위에 올려준 다음, 실온에서 2시간 동안 발효시켜줍니다.
5. 도넛 반죽이 발효될 동안, 라즈베리 크림을 준비해줍니다. 그릇에 생크림, 설탕, 라즈베리 잼을 넣어준 다음, 3-4분간 뿔이 설 때까지 휘핑해줍니다. 짤주머니에 옮겨담은 후, 사용하기 전 까지 냉장보관해줍니다.
6. 식용유를 5-6분간 180-200C / 365-400F가 될 때까지 중약불에 올려줍니다. 온도에 도달하면 약불로 줄여준 다음, 도넛을 튀겨줍니다. 골든브라운색(황금색)이 될 때까지, 각 면을 1분 30초~2분간 튀겨줍니다. 다 튀겨진 도넛은 식힘망 위에서 식혀줍니다. 그리고 설탕에 한번 굴려줍니다.
7. 젓가락, 리유저블 빨대 등을 이용해 도넛 안 크림이 들어갈 공간을 만들어 줍니다. 그리고 아까 만들어 둔 라즈베리 크림을 도넛에 채워줍니다. 각 도넛을 라즈베리를 올려 장식해줍니다.

snippet.title: Raspberry Cream Donuts Recipe 라즈베리 크림 도넛 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
*donuts (12 donuts)
따뜻한 물 75g(1/3cup minus 1tsp) lukewarm water
강력분 350g(2 3/4cup plus 1Tbsp) bread flour
설탕 30g(2Tbsp) sugar
소금 5g(1/2tsp) salt
인스턴트 이스트 4g(1tsp) instant yeast
계란 2 eggs
말랑한 상태의 무염버터 65g(4 1/2Tbsp) unsalted butter(softened)

*raspberry cream (for 6 donuts)
라즈베리(산딸기) 잼 혹은 퓨레 90g(6T) raspberry jam or puree
생크림 320g(1 1/4cups) heavy cream
설탕 30g(2T) sugar

설탕 (90g)6T sugar
장식용 냉동 혹은 생 라즈베리 Extra fresh or frozen raspberry for decor

식용유 Cooking oil


1. In a bowl, put bread flour, sugar, salt, instant yeast, eggs, and lukewarm water. Using a stand mixer, knead in medium-low speed, until it came out in one dough, about 2 min.
2. While set at low speed, add softened unsalted butter, 15g(1Tbsp) at a time. When all butter is combined, set to medium speed, until dough is smooth and shiny, about 12-15min using stand mixer. Wrap the bowl, and let it rise for 1-2 hours until double in size. 
*note: if you don’t have a stand mixer, you can make by your hand :)
3. Punch down the dough to release the air, and divide the dough into 50g(1.7oz, 12 donuts). To shape into balls, place ball on the work surface and rest the side of your hand next to it so your palm and fingers are cupped around it. Do the same process on the rest of the dough.
4. Roll out the ball-shaped doughs into a flat round shape. Place onto the 11.5cm(4.5inch) square parchment paper. Let it rise for 2 hours in room temp.
5. While doughs getting rise, we’re gonna prepare raspberry cream. Place heavy cream, sugar, and raspberry jam into the bowl, and whip until it gets stiff peak, about 3-4min. Transfer into the piping bag and store it in the fridge until use.
6. Heat the cooking oil, about 180-200C / 365~400F, about 6m in medium-low heat. When oil reach on that heat, turn the heat to low. Frying them until getting golden brown, I fried for 1min 30sec~2min for each side. After frying, chill in a cooling rack. After that, roll the donuts in sugar. 
7. With a chopstick or reusable straw, etc.. make a hole to give some space for raspberry cream. And Fill the donuts with raspberry cream, which made earlier. Decorate with raspberry to each donut.

1. 그릇에 박력분, 설탕, 소금, 인스턴트 이스트, 따뜻한 물을 넣어줍니다. 스탠드 믹서에서 2분간 한덩이로 뭉칠 때 까지 중-저속으로 돌려줍니다.
2. 저속으로 스탠드믹서를 설정한 다음, 말랑한 상태의 버터를 1큰술씩 넣어가며 돌려줍니다. 버터가 완전히 섞이게 되면 중속으로 올려 12-15분간 반죽이 매끄럽고 부드러워 질 때까지 돌려줍니다. 그리고 랩을 씌운 다음 1-2시간 동안 반죽이 두배로 부풀 때 까지 실온에서 발효시켜줍니다.
*참고: 스탠드믹서가 없다면 손으로 하셔도 만드실 수 있어요
3. 반죽의 기포를 빼준 다음, 반죽을 50g(1.7oz, 12개 정도)로 나누어줍니다. 반죽을 테이블에 올려 손목과 손 끝을 테이블에 댄 상태로 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 남은 반죽 전부 둥글리기를 하여 준비해줍니다.
4. 둥글리기를 한 반죽을 밀대를 이용해 납작한 원 모양으로 펼쳐줍니다. 11.5cm(4.5inch) 정사각형 크기로 자른 유산지 위에 올려준 다음, 실온에서 2시간 동안 발효시켜줍니다.
5. 도넛 반죽이 발효될 동안, 라즈베리 크림을 준비해줍니다. 그릇에 생크림, 설탕, 라즈베리 잼을 넣어준 다음, 3-4분간 뿔이 설 때까지 휘핑해줍니다. 짤주머니에 옮겨담은 후, 사용하기 전 까지 냉장보관해줍니다.
6. 식용유를 5-6분간 180-200C / 365-400F가 될 때까지 중약불에 올려줍니다. 온도에 도달하면 약불로 줄여준 다음, 도넛을 튀겨줍니다. 골든브라운색(황금색)이 될 때까지, 각 면을 1분 30초~2분간 튀겨줍니다. 다 튀겨진 도넛은 식힘망 위에서 식혀줍니다. 그리고 설탕에 한번 굴려줍니다.
7. 젓가락, 리유저블 빨대 등을 이용해 도넛 안 크림이 들어갈 공간을 만들어 줍니다. 그리고 아까 만들어 둔 라즈베리 크림을 도넛에 채워줍니다. 각 도넛을 라즈베리를 올려 장식해줍니다.

snippet.title: Korean Mozzarella Cheese Ball from scratch : No Bake Recipe 홈메이드 모짜렐라 치즈볼 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello viewers! Today’s recipe is Korean Mozzarella Cheese Ball from scratch.
It’s crunchy and chewy outside, warm and flavorful cheese inside of it.

You can see cheese ball, especially from BHC(the chicken restaurant in Korea) in lots of mukbang.
In Korea, people are making a copycat of that with selling glutinous-doughnut pre-mix.
But because of it's product form Korea, so If you are not live in here, it's hard to find. So I thought why not show you guys how to make cheese ball without pre-mix!
It’s not perfectly same taste and texture, mine is more crunchy texture than BHC one.

For water, I wrote 60~80ml. Amount of water is really making difference with what brand of glutinous flour is, and what atmosphere you make.
If your dough is too dry, it’s hard to roll the dough with mozzarella cheese. It easily breaks apart. 
And If it’s too wet, It has another problem. 
The dough has to be like baby’s butt… you know? 😭
I can’t fully explain about it, but it has to be moist like proper bread dough!

Another important ingredient is salt. 
Glutinous flour is not like normal wheat flour(I mean, bread flour, all-purpose flour etc…).
It REALLY NEEDS SALT.
If you don’t add it, it tastes like nothing. No taste at all 😂

I added only mozzarella cheese, but with adding little bit of cream cheese, it will better.
Mozzarella cheese can substitute with string cheese :)


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(No Flour! Red Velvet Cheese Brownie) : http://bit.ly/2Xh4DbW
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
100g(2/3cup) glutinous flour
25g(2 1/2Tbsp) all-purpose flour
2g(1/4tsp) salt
15g(1Tbsp) sugar
0.5g(1/8tsp) baking powder
15g(1Tbsp) unsalted butter
60~80ml(1/3~1/4cup) hot water

Mozzarella cheese

1. In a bowl, mix well with adding glutinous flour, all-purpose flour, salt, sugar, and baking powder.
2. Add little amount of hot water and mix. If it gets crumbly, add butter and mix with your hand (not knead, really)
3. Add water and mix until it clumps into a dough. And rest the dough for about 30 min.
4. Cut the mozzarella cheese into a cube shape.
5. Divide the dough for about 20~25g (1 heaping Tbsp) and roll with mozzarella cube.
6. Put the oil 160~170C / 320~340F and frying for about 7~8min, until golden brown.

snippet.title: Galette Des Rois Recipe : New Year Dessert Recipe 🔔
snippet.description:
Eng subtitle will available within a hour🧡
📸 @sweethailey_ [http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf](http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf)
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com


/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
-18cm galette des roise
-갈레트 데 루아 18cm 


🥨Puff pastry 퍼프 페이스트리
250g(1+3/4cups) all-purpose flour 중력분
7g(3/4tsp) salt 소금
175g(3/4cup) cold unsalted butter 차가운 무염버터
100~130ml(1/3~1/2cup) cold water 찬 물
all-purpose flour 중력분

🥨Almond cream 아몬드 크림
100g(1cup) almond flour 아몬드 가루
75g(1/3cup plus 1tsp) sugar 설탕
1 egg 계란
50g(3Tbsp plus 2tsp) unsalted butter, softened 무염버터, 실온
1 egg yolk 계란 노른자


✨퍼프페이스트리 만들기: 
1. 버터를 큐브모양으로 자른다.
2. 그릇에 중력분, 소금, 버터를 한 그릇에 넣고, 스크래퍼로 버터를 자르듯이 섞는다.
3. 물을 조금씩 넣어가며 한 덩어리로 반죽을 뭉친다. 물은 뭉쳐질 정도로만 조절해가며 넣는다. 
4. 완성된 반죽은 반으로 나눈 다음(선택사항), 비닐에 싸 30분간 냉장보관한다.
5. 휴지한 반죽은 밀가루를 뿌린 다음, 직사각형 모양으로 반죽을 편다. 삼등분으로 반죽을 접은 다음, 냉장고에서 20분간 휴지한다.(총 3회 반복).

✨아몬드크림 만들기:
1. 실온의 무염버터를 그릇에 넣고 푼다. 설탕을 넣고 섞은 다음, 계란을 넣고 한번 더 섞는다. 아몬드가루를 넣어 골고루 섞는다. 완성된 아몬드크림은 짤주머니에 담아 준비한다.

✨갈레트 데 루아 만들기: 
1. 오븐을 섭씨 210도(화씨 410도)로 예열한다.
2. 퍼프 페이스트리를 얇게 편다(2~4mm). 18cm 원형 틀을 이용해 반죽을 자른다.
3. 퍼프 페이스트리에 가장자리 1cm 가량을 남겨둔 채 아몬드 크림을 짠다. 가장자리에 계란노른자를 바른 다음, 퍼프 페이스트리로 덮는다.  
4. 갈레트 데 루아의 가장자리를 버터나이프를 이용해 모양을 낸다. 윗면은 계란노른자를 바른다. 1~2분가량 두어 계란노른자를 굳힌다.
5. 꼬치나 이쑤시개 등을 이용해 윗면에 모양을 낸다.
6. 예열한 오븐에서 30분~35분간 윗면이 노릇해질 때 까지 굽는다. (구움색이 많이 나면 갈레트 데 루아 위에 호일 등으로 덮어 굽는다.


✨Making puff pastry:
1. Cut the cold butter into cubes.
2. Put all-purpose flour, salt and butter in a bowl and mix with a scraper as like cutting butter.
3. Add water little by little and knead the dough into one lump. Add water, adjusting it just enough to make it clump together.
4. Divide the finished dough in half (optional), then wrap in plastic and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
5. Sprinkle flour on the rested dough, and then spread the dough into a rectangular shape. Fold the dough into thirds and rest in the fridge for 20 minutes (repeat 3 times in total).

✨Making almond cream:
1. Put room temperature unsalted butter in a bowl and loosen it. Add sugar and mix, then add eggs and mix again. Add almond powder and mix gently. Put the finished almond cream in a piping bag.

✨Making galette de rois:
1. Preheat the oven to 210 degrees Celsius (410 degrees Fahrenheit).
2. Spread puff pastry thinly (2-4mm). Cut the dough using an 18cm round mold.
3. Squeeze the almond cream, leaving about 1cm of the edge of the puff pastry. Brush the edges with egg yolk, then cover with another puff pastry.
4. Use a butter knife to shape the edges of the galette de rois. Coat the top with egg yolk. Leave for 1~2min to harden.
5. Use a skewer or toothpick to shape the top.
6. Bake in a preheated oven for 30~35 minutes until the top is golden. (If the color is too burnt, cover the galette de rois with foil, etc., and bake.


/ MUSIC /
Opportunity Walks - Kevin MacLeod
Shades of Spring - Kevin MacLeod

snippet.title: Giant Puff Pastry Jam Tart Recipe 대왕 후렌치파이 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
중력분 250g(1+3/4cups) all-purpose flour
소금 5g(2/3tsp) salt
찬 무염버터 175g(1.5 sticks) cold unsalted butter
찬 물 ~150ml(2/3cup) cold water

Strawberry jam (or raspberry jam)

1. 푸드 프로세서에 중력분, 소금, 찬 무염버터를 넣고 버터가 알갱이 상태가 될 때까지 돌려줍니다. 한번에 물을 다 넣지 말고, 조금씩 넣어가며 한 덩이로 뭉칠 때까지 돌려줍니다.
(손으로 페이스트리 반죽 만드는 방법은 이 영상을 참고해주세요 (https://bit.ly/39ZAKow))
2. 밀가루를 가볍게 뿌려준 다음, 직사각형으로 만들어 줍니다. 반죽을 삼등분으로 접은 다음, 냉장고에 10~15분간 휴지시켜 줍니다. 
3. 냉장고에서 반죽을 꺼내 다시한 번 직사각형으로 밀어 삼등분 접는 과정을 한 번 더 반복 해 줍니다.
4. 오븐을 섭씨 180도(화씨 355도)로 예열해줍니다. 반죽을 1cm (0.4 inch)로 페이스트리 반죽을 밀어펴줍니다. 직사각형 모양으로 잘라준다음, 잼을 올려둘 곳에 포크로 꼼꼼히 구멍내줍니다. 딸기잼 혹은 라즈베리 잼을 올려줍니다. 예열된 오븐에서 35~40분간 구워 완성해줍니다.

1. Put the all purpose flour, salt, and cold unsalted butter in the food processor and blend until the butter is fully blended. Add water little by little, and blend until it clumps together. Don’t add all the water at once.
(Please check out this video for how to make pastry dough by hand (https://bit.ly/39ZAKow))
2. Lightly sprinkle with flour and roll out to a rectangle. Fold the dough into thirds and let it rest in the refrigerator for 10~15 minutes.
3. Take the dough out of the fridge, roll out into a rectangle, and fold it into thirds. Repeat the process once more.
4. Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius (355 degrees Fahrenheit). Roll out the pastry dough into 1cm (0.4 inch). Cut it into a rectangular shape, and then poke a hole with fork in the place where the jam will be placed. Spread strawberry or raspberry jam. Bake for 35-40 minutes in a preheated oven to finish.


🤍[앵커버터] 무염버터(454g): https://bit.ly/3229iSx
🤍[쥬에그]라즈베리잼(320g): https://bit.ly/3mAZp7P

snippet.title: Portuguese Egg Tart Recipe 🍳
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
*퍼프 페이스트리 puff pastry
중력분 250g(1 3/4cup) all-purpose flour
소금 7g(1tsp) salt
찬 무염버터 175g(1.5 sticks) cold unsalted butter
찬 물 ~150ml(2/3cup) cold water

*커스터드 custard
중력분 30g(3Tbsp) all-purpose flour
설탕 200g(1cup) sugar
우유(1) 260ml(1cup plus 4tsp) milk(1)
우유(2) 40ml(2 1/2Tbsp) milk(2)
시나몬 스틱 1 cinnamon stick
물 160ml(2/3cup) water
바닐라 빈 1 vanilla bean
계란 노른자 6 egg yolks

🤍바닐라빈 25g : https://bit.ly/2LxpaHy
🤍실리콘매트(화이트/60*40) : https://bit.ly/3iiOz4q
🤍[엘르앤비르] 고메버터(500g)_무염버터 : https://bit.ly/2LPYylB

✨ Puff Pastry 퍼프 페이스트리 ✨
1. 버터를 잘게 잘라줍니다.
2. 중력분, 소금, 버터를 푸드 프로세서에 넣고 30초 정도 동안 갈아줍니다.
3. 물을 조금씩 넣어가며 한 덩어리로 뭉쳐질 때 까지 푸드프로세서를 돌려줍니다. 물을 전부 넣지말고, 뭉쳐질 정도로만 넣어주세요. 완성된 반죽은 30분 동안 냉장보관 해 줍니다.
4. 냉장고에서 반죽을 꺼내 밀가루를 가볍게 뿌려준 다음, 밀대를 사용해 직사각형으로 밀어 펴줍니다. 반죽의 밑 부분과 윗 부분의 짧은 끝을 직사각형의 중앙으로 접습니다. 윗부분이 아랫부분보다 짧에 접어주세요. 그리고 반으로 접게 되면 총 4겹의 두꺼운 직사각형이 완성됩니다. 랩으로 싸서 20 분 동안 냉장 보관합니다.
5. 냉장고에서 꺼낸 반죽은 90도 회전 한 다음 직사각형 모양으로 펴줍니다. 반죽을 편지 종이처럼 3 등분으로 접은 다음 냉장고에서 20 분 동안 휴지 해주세요. 이 과정을 한 번 더 반복합니다 (총 2회). 마지막으로 접고 나서는 냉장고에 30 분 이상 휴지 해 주세요.

1. Chop the cold unsalted butter.
2. Add all-purpose flour, salt, and butter to the food processor and blend for about 30 seconds.
3. Add water little by little and turn the food processor until it clumps together. Do not add all the water, just add it to until it clumps. Wrap it, and refrigerate the dough for 30 minutes.
4. Take the dough out of the fridge, sprinkle lightly with flour, and roll out with a rolling pin to make a rectangle. Fold the bottom and top short ends of your dough towards the center of the rectangle. Top ends should be shorter than bottom. Fold the top half over onto the bottom half, so you have 4 layers of dough in a thick square, wrap it and refrigerate for 20min.
5. When it's came out of the fridge, give it a 90-degree turn, and flatten the dough into a rectangle. Fold the dough into thirds, like a letter, then let it rest in the refrigerator for 20 minutes. Repeat this process one more time (a total of 2 times). When it is final fold, let it rest in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.

✨ Custard 커스터드 ✨
1. 소스팬에 설탕, 물, 시나몬 스틱을 넣고 중약불에서 끓입니다. 거품이 일기 시작하면 1분간 더 끓여준 다음, 사용하기 전 까지 식혀줍니다(시나몬 시럽)
2. 다른 팬에 우유 260ml(1컵 + 4작은술)을 넣고 팬의 가장자리에 거품이 일때까지 끓여줍니다. 그릇에 우유 40ml(2 1/2큰술)과 중력분을 넣고 잘 섞어줍니다. 섞은 밀가루 혼합물에 뜨거운 우유를 천천히 부어가며 섞어줍니다. 그리고 시나몬 시럽을 함께 넣어 섞어줍니다. 5~10분간 따뜻할 때 까지 식혀줍니다. 
3. 우유 혼합물이 적당히 식으면 계란노른자를 넣고 잘 저어줍니다. 체에 한번 걸러 준비 해 줍니다.

1. In a saucepan, put sugar, water, and cinnamon stick, and bring it on to medium-low heat. When it starts to boil, let it boil for another 1 min and remove it from the heat. Leave it at room temp until use(cinnamon syrup).
2. In another pan, put 260ml(1cup plus 4tsp) of milk, and simmer in low heat until the edge starts to boil. Put 40ml(2 1/2Tbsp) of milk and all-purpose flour into the bowl, and mix until well combined. Stream the hot milk into the milk-flour mixture while mixing. And pour the cinnamon syrup in it and mix. Leave for 5~10 min until it’s warm, not hot.
3. When the milk mixture is getting slightly cooled down, add egg yolks, and mix well. Strain the mixture before use.

✨ 에그타트르 완성하기 ✨
1. 오븐은 섭씨 230도(화씨 450도)로 예약합니다.
2. 냉장고에서 꺼낸 퍼프 페이스트리를 다시 0.4~0.5cm(약 0.2inch) 두께의 직사각형으로 펴줍니다. 반죽을 돌돌 말아 원기둥 모량으로 만들어준 다음, 12등분으로 잘라줍니다.
3. 자른 퍼프페이스트리를 머핀 틀에 넣고 일정한 두께로 반죽을 펴줍니다. 
4. 머핀틀에 커스터드 크림을 2큰술 가량 채워준 다음, 예열한 오븐에서 25~30분가량 검은 반점이 생길 때까지 구워줍니다.

1. Preheat the oven to 230 Degrees Celsius(450 Degrees Fahrenheit).
2. Roll out the puff pastry from the refrigerator into a 0.4-0.5 cm(about 0.2 inches) thick rectangle. Roll the dough into a cylinder shape and cut it into 12 equal parts.
3. Put the cut puff pastry in the muffin mold and spread the dough to an even thickness.
4. Fill the muffin pan with 2 tablespoons of custard cream, then bake in a preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes until dark burnt spots appear.

Sunshine_Samba

snippet.title: ✨Croquembouche✨ Recipe For Christmas🎄 크로캉부슈 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
-1 croquembouche 
-크로캉부슈 1개

*Double the recipe to make tall croquembouche
*큰 크로캉부슈를 만드려면 슈와 커스터드 크림을 2배분으로 만들어 주세요

*슈 / 퍼프 페이스트리 Puff / Choux pastry
무염버터 45g(3Tbsp plus 1tsp) unsalted butter
물 120g(1/2cup) water
소금 2g(1/4tsp) salt
설탕 5g(1tsp) sugar
박력분 70g(1/2cup) cake flour
계란 2 eggs

*커스터드 크림 Custard Cream
계란 노른자 2 egg yolks
박력분 30g(2Tbsp) cake flour
설탕 70g(1/3cup) sugar
바닐라 익스트랙 5g(1tsp) vanilla extract
우유 200ml(3/4cup plus 4tsp) milk
무염버터 25g(5tsp) unsalted butter
생크림 160ml(2/3cup) heavy cream
설탕 15g(1Tbsp) sugar

*캬라멜 Caramel
설탕 150g(3/4cup) sugar
물 80g(1/3cup) water

스프링클 Sprinkles

*Puff / Choux pastry
1. Preheat the oven to 190 degrees Celsius(375 Fahrenheit). Line the baking tray with parchment paper.
2. Put unsalted butter, salt, sugar, and water in a pot. Turn the heat to medium, and melt the butter. When butter is melted, remove from the heat, add cake flour. Mix until well combined.
3. In medium heat, gently cook the dough. Stir for 4~5min to evenly cooked. Once it came out in one dough, remove it from the heat. And transfer into the bowl to chill faster. Chill for 3~5min in room temp.
4. Crack the eggs in a cup or bowl, and gently whisk. Slowly add the beaten eggs into the cooked dough, and mix. The choux pastry will smooth, shiny, and kinda thick texture. Transfer into the piping bag.
5. Pipe the batter onto the baking tray with parchment paper on. Each of the choux pastry should 3 inches apart, at least. Spraying the water over the choux pastry. Press down the pointy part of the choux pastry. Bake in the preheated oven for 20min. Don’t open it while still bake. 

1. 섭씨 190도 (화씨 375도)로 오븐을 예열 해 둡니다. 오븐 팬을 유산지를 깔아 준비해둡니다.
2. 냄비에 무염버터, 소금, 설탕과 물을 넣습니다. 버터가 완전히 녹을 때까지 중불에 올려둡니다. 버터가 완전히 녹게되면 불에서 내려준 다음, 박력분을 넣습니다. 골고루 섞어주세요.
3. 중불에 다시 냄비를 올려준 다음, 반죽을 익혀줍니다. 4~5분 동안 잘 섞어가며 반죽을 익혀주세요. 반죽이 한덩이로 뭉쳐지면 불에서 내려줍니다. 그리고 다른 그릇에 옮겨 빨리 식을 수 있도록 해주세요. 3~5분간 실온에서 식혀줍니다.
4. 계란을 컵이나 그릇에 깨준 다음, 잘 풀어줍니다. 푼 계란을 익힌 반죽에 천천히 부어가며 섞어줍니다. 반죽은 겉 표면이 매끈하고 반짝거리며, 약간 되직한 질감이 날 거에요. 완성된 반죽은 짤주머니에 옮겨줍니다.
5. 반죽을 유산지 위에 짜줍니다. 각 슈의 최소 6~7cm 간격을 두고 짜주세요. 슈의 윗면에 물을 뿌려줍니다. 그리고 뾰족한 모양이 있으면 손으로 가볍게 다듬어줍니다. 예열한 오븐에 20분간 구워주세요. 절대 굽는 중에는 오븐을 열지 마세요.


*Custard Cream
1. In a bowl or cup, mix cake flour, sugar, vanilla extract, and egg yolks. Mix until well combined.
2. Simmer the milk on low heat. When it starts to boil on edge of the pot, remove it from the heat.
3. Pour the hot milk into the egg yolk mixture. Whisk gently while pouring the milk. Transfer it into the pot, and turn the heat to low. Cook for 6~8min, until the custard cream is thickened.
4. When it’s thickened, turn off the heat and add unsalted butter. Mix to well combined. Wrap the custard cream, the wrap should touch the surface of the custard cream. If not, the custard cream gets harden. Chill it in the fridge, at least 2 hours.
5. Whip the heavy cream with 15g sugar, until it gets a stiff peak. And add chilled custard cream, and mix lightly. Transfer into the piping bag.

1. 그릇 혹은 컵에 박력분, 설탕, 바닐라 익스트랙과 계란노른자를 넣습니다. 잘 섞어줍니다.
2. 우유를 약불에서 데워줍니다. 냄비의 겉 부분이 끓어오르기 시작하면 불에서 내려주세요.
3. 우유를 계란노른자에 부어줍니다. 우유를 부어줄 동안 계속 저어줍니다. 다시 냄비로 옮겨준 다음, 약불에 올려줍니다. 커스터드 크림이 되직해 질 때까지 6~8분간 잘 섞어주며 익혀줍니다.
4. 크림이 되직해지면 불에서 내려준 다음, 무염버터를 넣어줍니다. 잘 섞어줍니다. 완성된 커스터드 크림은 랩을 씌워줍니다. 커스터드 크림의 표면이 랩에 닿도록 해 주세요. 아니면 겉 부분이 딱딱하게 굳게됩니다. 냉장고에서 최소 2시간 동안 휴지시켜줍니다.
5. 생크림과 설탕을 단단한 뿔이 생길 때까지 휘핑 해줍니다. 그리고 차가운 커스터드 크림을 넣고 가볍게 섞어줍니다. 짤주머니에 옮겨담아줍니다.


*Assembly
1. With a chopstick or skewer, make the little hole. Fill the tip into the underside of each choux pastry and pipe the custard cream into the hollow center. When all choux pastry is filled up, chill it in a fridge for 1 hour.
2. Using any parchment paper, foil, etc, make a large corn-tower shape. And to make the caramel, put sugar and water into the pot, place on medium heat. Cook it until all sugar crystals are melted, and the color changes into golden brown. When the color changed, turn off the heat. Dip the bottom of the choux pastry, and stick onto the corn shaped paper. When the caramel is getting harden, turn it into the low heat, and use.
3. Spin the remaining caramel to form a web of sugar around the tower. Sprinkle some sprinkles.

1. 젓가락이나 꼬치 등을 이용해 밑부분에 작은 구멍을 만들어줍니다. 각 슈의 밑부분에 크림을 채워줍니다. 슈크림이 완성되면 냉장고에서 1시간 굳혀줍니다.
2. 유산지, 호일 등을 이용해 큰 원뿔 혹은 타워모양을 만들어 준비 해 줍니다. 그리고 캬라멜을 만들기 위해 설탕과 물을 냄비에 넣은 다음, 중불해 올려줍니다. 설탕 결정들이 모두 넣고 색이 골든브라운이 될 때까지 끓여줍니다. 색이 변하게 되면 불을 꺼줍니다. 슈크림의 아랫부분을 캬라멜에 담궈준 다음, 원뿔형 유산지에 붙여줍니다. 캬라멜을 굳게되면 약불에 올려 녹여가며 작업 해 줍니다.
3. 남은 캬라멜을 겉에 둘러가며 타워에 설탕 거미줄을 만들어줍니다. 스프링클을 뿌려서 완성해주세요.

snippet.title: Easy Apple Turnovers From Scratch Recipe 🍎 애플턴오버 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
-10~12 apple turnovers
-10~12개 분량

250g(1 3/4cup) all-purpose flour
7g(1tsp) salt
175g(1.5 sticks) cold unsalted butter
~150ml(2/3cup) cold water
 
3 apples, peeled, sliced
23g(1 + 1/2Tbsp) unsalted butter
165g(3/4cup) brown sugar
2g(3/4tsp) ground cinnamon or 1 cinnamon stick
5g(2tsp) starch
10g(2tsp) water
 
1 egg
15g(1Tbsp) water


중력분 250g(1 3/4cup)
소금 7g(1tsp)
찬 무염버터 175g(1.5 sticks)
찬 물 ~150ml(2/3cup)
 
사과 3개, 껍질 제거 해 잘게 썰어 준비 
무염버터 23g(1 + 1/2Tbsp)
황설탕 165g(3/4cup)
시나몬가루 2g(3/4tsp) 혹은 시나몬스틱 1개
전분 5g(2tsp)
물 10g(2tsp)
 
계란 1
물 15g(1Tbsp)


✨ Puff Pastry 퍼프 페이스트리 ✨
1. 버터를 잘게 잘라줍니다.
2. 중력분, 소금, 버터를 한 그릇에 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다. 스크래퍼를 이용해 버터가 콩 크기가 될 때까지 쪼개듯이 섞어주세요. 
3. 물을 조금씩 넣어가며 한 덩어리로 반죽을 뭉쳐줍니다. 물을 전부 넣지말고, 뭉쳐질 정도로만 넣어주세요. 완성된 반죽은 30분 동안 냉장보관 해 줍니다.
4. 냉장고에서 반죽을 꺼내 밀가루를 가볍게 뿌려준 다음, 직사각형으로 만들어 줍니다. 반죽을 삼등분으로 접은 다음, 냉장고에 10~15분간 휴지시켜 줍니다. 직사각형으로 밀어 삼등분 접는 과정을 두 번 더 반복 해 줍니다(총 3번). 마지막으로 접었을 때에는 20분 이상 냉장고에서 휴지시켜주세요.

1. Chop the cold unsalted butter.
2. In a bowl, put all-purpose flour, salt, and butter, mix all together. Using a scraper, mix like cutting butter until it is pea-sized. 
3. Add water, little at a time, knead until came out one dough. Don’t add water at once, add until just combined. Refrigerate for 30 min.
4. When it’s come out of the fridge, lightly dust with flour, and roll into a rectangle shape. Fold in thirds, like a letter. Refrigerate for 10~15min. Repeat this process two times more (3 times in total). In the last fold, refrigerate up to 20 min.


✨ Apple Filling 시과 필링 ✨
1. 사과 껍질을 벗기고, 잘게 잘라 준비 해 줍니다.
2. 냄비에 무염버터를 넣고, 중불에서 녹여줍니다. 완전히 버터가 녹으면 사과를 넣고 2분 간 저어줍니다. 황설탕과 시나몬스틱을 넣고 추가로 2분 더 저어가며 끓여줍니다. 2~30g 정도의 사과즙을 남겨둡니다.
3. 물에 전분을 풀어준 뒤, 사과 혼합물에 넣은 후, 2분간 더 저어가며 끓입니다. 불에서 내려준 다음, 사용하기 전 까지 식혀줍니다.

1. Peel off the apple, and chop finely.
2. In a pot, melt the unsalted butter on medium heat. When butter is completely melted, put chopped apples, and stir for 2 min. Add light brown sugar and cinnamon stick, mix and stir for an additional 2 min. Save 1/8cup of apple juice for later.
3. In water, put starch and mix. Put the starch mixture into the apple mixture, and stir for 2 min until water is dissolved. Turn off the heat, and let it cool until use.


✨ Assembles 애플 턴오버 만들기 ✨
1. 오븐을 섭씨 200도 (화씨 400도)로 예열 해 줍니다. 그릇에 계란 하나와 물을 넣고 섞어줍니다.
2. 휴지가 끝난 반죽을 꺼내 0.5센티 (0.2인치) 이하로 얇게 밀어줍니다. 원형 틀 혹은 머그컵을 이용해 동그랗게 잘라줍니다. 원형 반죽을 밀대로 가볍게 밀어 타원형으로 만들어 줍니다.
3. 반죽 가운데 1~2작은술 정도의 사과필링을 채워줍니다. 반죽의 끝부분에 물을 묻혀 준 다음, 반으로 접어줍니다. 반죽의 끝에서 약간 떨어진 부분을 꾹꾹 눌러 필링이 새어나오지 않게 해 줍니다. 
4. 젓가락이나 꼬치 등을 이용해 애플턴오버의 뒷쪽에 2~3개의 구멍을 내 줍니다. 그리고 윗면에 계란물을 발라 준 다음, 예열한 오븐에서 20~25분간 노릇노릇 할 때까지 구워줍니다.
5. 굽고난 후, 아까 남겨둔 사과 시럽을 애플턴오버 위에 발라줍니다.

1. Preheat the oven to 200 degrees Celsius(400 Fahrenheit). In a bowl, mix egg and water.
2. Roll the chilled dough for about 0.5cm (0.2inch). And cut it in a round shape with a round cookie cutter or mug. Roll the dough a bit to make an oval shape.
3. Put 1~2tsp of apple filling on the middle of the dough. Water the edge of the dough, and fold in half. Press a bit to prevent leaking. 
4. Using chopstick or skewer, make 2~3 holes. Brush the egg wash, and bake for 20~25min in a preheated oven.
5. After bake, brush the saved apple syrup on top of the apple turnover.

I made cronut, means pastry donut or croissant+donut.
Actually, I never ate this.. so I don’t know exact
taste. But I believe it’s similar.
It’s crunch outside and little bit chewy inside. It just like fried croissant.
I heard inside cronut, they fill with custard cream or vanilla cream. So I did that, but it wasn’t taste good than I thought. Maybe my cream recipe wasn’t fit with this cronut.

*For better taste, you can place in fridge about 1 day before you fry the dough.

snippet.title: Strawberry Custard Cookie Choux (Puff Pastry) Recipe
snippet.description:
cc(eng) is available 🤍
📸 @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com

/ INGREDIENTS /
-11 cookie choux
-쿠키슈 11개 분량

🥨Cookie Choux 쿠키슈
80g(5+1/3Tbsp) sugar 설탕
80g(5+2/3Tbsp) unsalted butter, softened 무염버터, 실온
80g(1/2cup + 1Tbsp) all-purpose flour 중력분

🥨Choux (Puff Pastry) 슈
68g(5Tbsp) unsalted butter 무염버터
90g(1/3cup + 2tsp) milk 우유
90g(1/3cup + 2tsp) water 물
1.5g(1/8tsp) salt 소금
8g(1+1/2tsp) sugar 설탕
105(3/4cup) pastry flour 박력분
3 eggs 계란

🥨Vanillca Custard Cream (Diplomat Cream) 커스터드 크림 (디플로마 크림)
4 egg yolks 계란 노른자
60g(4Tbsp) cake flour 박력분
140g(2/3cup) sugar 설탕
1 vanilla bean 바닐라 익스트랙
400ml(1+2/3cups) milk 우유
50g(3+2/3Tbsp) unsalted butter 무염버터
320ml(1+1/3cups) heavy cream 생크림
30g(2Tbsp) sugar 설탕

🥨assembly 완성하기
strawberries 딸기



/ UTENSILS 사용한 도구 /
1.Baking Mat 베이킹 매트: [https://amzn.to/3uytB7Q](https://amzn.to/3uytB7Q)
2.Magnetic Measuring Spoons 마그네틱 계량스푼: [https://amzn.to/3Lk2NPs](https://amzn.to/3Lk2NPs)
3.Ice Cube Tray 아이스큐브 트레이: [https://amzn.to/3wFcROY](https://amzn.to/3wFcROY)
4.4 Pieces Silicone Spatula Set 스패출러 세트 (강추✨): [https://amzn.to/3qDNpps](https://amzn.to/3qDNpps)



🧡커스터드 크림 만들기
👉🏻 레시피 참고 : (https://youtu.be/ZZizKms_OxY)

🧡쿠키슈 만들기
1. 설탕, 실온의 무염버터, 중력분을 볼에 넣고 밀가루가 더이상 보이지 않을 때까지 주걱으로 섞는다. 
2. 실리콘매트 혹은 유산지 위에 반죽을 올리고, 그 위에 비닐 혹은 유산지를 덮는다. 
3. 밀대를 이용해 0.3cm 두께로 민 다음 30분간 냉장보관한다.
4. 냉장보관 후, 5cm 원형커터로 잘라 준비한다.

🧡슈 만들기
1. 오븐을 섭씨 180도(화씨 000도)로 예열한다.
2. 냄비에 우유, 물, 소금, 설탕, 버터를 넣고 버터가 완전히 녹을 때까지 약불에서 데운다.
3. 버터가 모두 녹으면, 불을 끄고 박력분을 넣는다. 가루가 더이상 보이지 않을 때까지 스패출러로 섞는다.
4. 다시 약불에 올려, 반죽이 매끈한 한 덩이가 될 때까지 스패출러로 섞는다.
5. 반죽은 불에 내린 다음, 볼에 옮겨담는다. 반죽이 식도록 5~8분간 실온에서 식힌다.
6. 계란을 조금씩 넣어가며 되직한 질감이 될 때까지 섞는다. 완성된 반죽은 짤주머니에 옮겨담는다.
7. 유산지 위에 반죽을 4~5cm 크기로 짠다. 그 위에 쿠키슈를 올린다.
8. 180도에서 30~35분간 윗면이 골든브라운 색이 될 때까지 굽는다. 완성된 쿠키슈는 식힘망에서 충분히 식힌다.

🧡완성하기
1. 딸기는 깨끗이 씻어 꼭지를 제거하여 준비한다.
2. 쿠키슈의 윗면의 1/3 지점을 빵칼을 이용해 자른다.
3. 쿠키슈 안에 커스터드 크림을 조금 짜 넣고, 딸기를 그 위에 고정한다. 그리고 쿠키슈 안을 커스터드 크림으로 완전히 채운다. 자른 쿠키슈 뚜껑를 덮어 완성한다.



🧡Custard Cream
👉🏻 Recipe : [https://youtu.be/ZZizKms_OxY](https://youtu.be/ZZizKms_OxY)

🧡Cookies for Cookie Choux
1. Put sugar, room temp unsalted butter, and cake flour in a bowl and mix with a spatula until the flour is no longer visible.
2. Put the dough on a silicone mat or parchment paper, and cover it with plastic or parchment paper.
3. Roll out to 0.3cm thickness using a rolling pin and refrigerate for 30 min.
4. After refrigeration, cut with a 5cm circular cutter.

🧡Choux(Puff Pastry) for Cookie Choux
1. Preheat the oven to 180 degrees Celsius (355 degrees Fahrenheit).
2. Put milk, water, salt, sugar, and unsalted butter in a saucepan and heat over low heat until the butter is completely melted.
3. When the butter is all melted, turn off the heat and add cake flour. Mix with a spatula until no more flour is visible.
4. Put back on low heat and mix with a spatula until the dough becomes a smooth lump.
5. Remove the dough from the heat, then transfer to a bowl. Allow the dough to cool at room temperature for 5~8 min.
6. Add eggs little by little and mix until the texture is thick. Transfer the batter to a piping bag.
7. Squeeze into 4-5cm size on parchment paper. Place cookie dough on top of it.
8. Bake in a preheated oven for 30-35 minutes until the top turns golden brown. Cool the finished cookie choux on a cooling rack.

🧡Assembly
1. Prepare strawberries by washing them and removing the stems.
2. Cut 1/3 of the cookie choux top part using a bread knife.
3. Squeeze some custard cream inside the cookie choux and put strawberry on top. Then, completely fill the inside of the cookie choux with custard cream. Cover the cut cookie choux lid.

Members Only - TrackTribe
By the Fireplace - TrackTribe

snippet.title: Gluten Free ✨ Black Sesame Cream Puff w. rice flour : 흑임자 슈크림 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Homemade Granola) : http://bit.ly/2MYr2WX
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
50g(3 1/2tbsp) unsalted butter
100ml(1/3cup plus 4tsp) water
Pinch of salt
50g(1/3cup) rice flour
2 eggs

250ml(1cup) heavy cream
10g(1/2Tbsp) black sesame paste
25g(5tsp) sugar

-option
Melted dark chocolate
Melted white chocolate
Melted pink(strawberry flavor) chocolate

Before you make : Preheat the oven to 180C / 355F
1. In a pot, put water, salt, and unsalted butter. Melt the butter in low heat.
2. When the butter is all melted, remove from the heat. Add rice flour and mix.
3. Place back to the stove, and mix in low heat. When butter comes out from the dough, it’s time to remove the heat.
4. Add eggs, one at a time, mix until smooth.
5. Transfer the batter into a piping bag. Squeeze the batter on a baking sheet, about 5cm(2inch) round shape. Bake for 30~35min. While it is bake, don’t open the oven.
6. In a bowl, put heavy cream, black sesame paste, and sugar. Mix until it gets a stiff peak. Transfer into the piping bag.
7. Slice the top of the puff, on that, decorate with chocolate. (I tried to make into the Halloween-ish design, but it failed.) And fill the puff with black sesame cream. Place the top of the puff and finish.

snippet.title: Strawberry Cream Puff : cookie choux 딸기 쿠키슈  | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey :)
Today’s recipe is cream puff with strawberry inside. 

Cream puff with full of strawberry flavor inside, it tastes like heaven. 
You can make the strawberry compote with a fresh one, but like me, you can use frozen one.
So you can enjoy this recipe throughout the year!

Cream puff is though to make one. You have to through lots of processes,, I’m a kinda lazy person but I love my recipe(lol) so I make them a lot.

And with this cream puff recipe, I never failed with that. So hope you make it well 😆
If you think this recipe is too hard to make, you can skip the ‘whipped cream’. 
I hope you like this recipe! It’s one of the best recipes in 2019 :)


🌙Subscribe : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Strawberry Cupcakes) : http://bit.ly/2sXeR3g
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!
 

🌙Ingredients
Pate sucree(‘cookie part’ of cream puff) : 70g(5Tbsp) unsalted butter, 70g(1/3cup) white sugar, 70g(1/2cup) pastry flour

cream puff : 45g(3Tbsp plus 1tsp) unsalted butter, 60g(1/4cup) milk, 60g(1/4cup) water, 2g(1/4tsp) salt, 5g(1tsp) white sugar, 70g(1/2cup) pastry flour, 2 eggs

Strawberry compote : 200g(7oz) strawberries, 50g(1/4cup) sugar, 5g(1tsp) vanilla extract, 15g(1Tbsp) lemon juice

Strawberry cream : 1/2 of strawberry compote, 120g(1/2cup) heavy cream, 1 gelatin sheet

Whipped cream : 80g(1/4cup) heavy cream, 3g(1/2tsp) vanilla extract, 8g(1Tbsp) icing sugar

*만들기 전 : 버터는 실온에 보관하여 부드러운 상태로 준비해 줍니다. 계란은 실온으로 준비해줍니다.
1. Pate sucree(‘cookie part’ of cream puff)
 In a bowl, whisk the unsalted butter. Add sugar and pastry flour, mix until well combined. Keep the dough in the fridge at least 2 hours. After chill, roll the dough to less than 0.1~0.2 inch( and freeze for about 15 min.

2. Cream puff
 In a pan, put water, milk, salt, sugar, and butter. Put it in low heat and stir until all butter is melted. 
 Add pastry flour and mix until combined into one dough.
 When it gets smooth and shiny texture, turn off the heat and transfer into another bowl.
 Add eggs small amount at a time and mix.

3. Bake cookie choux
 Put the cream puff dough into the piping bag, and make the 6~7 cream puff. 
 Cut the ‘pate sucree’ into a round shape and put it over the top of cream puff dough.
 Bake 180C / 355F to 30~35, until it gets golden brown. When it comes out into the oven, put onto the cooling rack until chilled enough. 

4. Strawberry compote
 In a pan, put strawberry, sugar, vanilla extract and lemon juice on a medium to low heat. Mix about 4~5 minutes, until moist comes out. 
 After remove from the heat, blend roughly using a food processor.
 Put half of the compote in the piping bag, and fridge until use.

5. Strawberry cream
 Whip the heavy cream and mix with half of the compote. Transfer into the piping bag.

5. Whipped cream
 In a bowl, put heavy cream, vanilla extract and icing sugar, mix until it gets a stiff peak.

6. Assemble strawberry cookie chow
 Bottom of cookie choux, make a hole with a chopstick or anything long and sharp thing and pipe the strawberry compote through the hole just a little bit. Rest of the part is filled with strawberry cream. 
 On top of cookie choux, pipe the whipped cream and finish with a halved strawberry.
