snippet.title: Salted Bread Bun🥖소금빵 만들기 | Shio Pan, Salted Roll, Salted Bread Roll Recipe
snippet.description:
📸 @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com

/ INGREDIENTS /
-8 buns
-소금빵 8개

따뜻한 물 100g(6Tbsp) warm water
따뜻한 우유 65g(1/4cup plus 1tsp) warm milk
인스턴트 드라이 이스트 4g(1+1/2tsp) instant dry yeast
설탕 12g(1Tbsp) sugar
소금 4g(1/2tsp) salt
강력분 210g(1+1/2cups) bread flour
박력분 50g(1/3cup) cake flour

우유 milk
펄솔트 pearl salt
가염버터 115g(8Tbsp, 1/2cup) salted butter


🤍[선인]펄솔트(500g/프레즐소금/굵은소금): https://bit.ly/2RjTo4i
🤍[루어팍] 가염버터(250g): https://bit.ly/2RaXhIR
🤍[사프]인스턴트 드라이이스트(레드/125g): https://bit.ly/3ylohWT


1. 따뜻한 물에 설탕과 인스턴트 드라이 이스트를 넣고, 5분간 기다려줍니다.
2. 그릇에 강력분, 박력분, 따뜻한 우유, 소금, 이스트 혼합물을 넣고 반죽 해줍니다. 12~15분간 반죽이 손에 달라붙지 않고, 매끈해질 때까지 반죽해줍니다. (7분 이상 반죽해도 반죽이 질다면 강력분을 5g 넣고 1~2분가량 반죽해줍니다. 그래도 질다면 이 방법을 반복해주세요) 반죽이 완료되었으면 그릇에 랩을 씌우고 1시간 30분동안 실온에서 발효해줍니다.
3. 반죽이 발효 될 동안, 가염버터를 길쭉한 직사각형 형태로 잘라줍니다. 가염버터는 사용하기 전까지 냉장보관해주세요.
4. 반죽의 발효가 완료되면, 도마 혹은 테이블 위에 올려두고 손가락으로 꾹꾹 눌러가며 기포를 정리해줍니다. 반죽은 8등분으로 나눠줍니다. 소분한 반죽을 잡은 손목과 손날을 바닥에 붙인 채 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 둥글리기한 반죽은 실온에서 15분간 발효해줍니다.
5. 반죽의 한쪽 끝을 손으로 밀어 원뿔모양을 만들어줍니다. 원뿔의 꼭지가 위를 향하게 놓은 다음, 밀대를 이용해 일정한 두께로 밀어줍니다. 스크래퍼를 이용해 모양을 잡아가며 길쭉한 삼각형 모양이 되도록 밀어주세요. 삼각형의 밑면에 잘라둔 가염버터를 올려두고, 돌돌 말아줍니다. 
6. 완성된 소금빵 반죽의 끝부분이 바닥을 향하게 오븐 팬에 배치해주세요. 위에 랩 혹은 젖은 거즈/행주 등을 올려둔 다음, 1시간 반 동안 실온에서 발효해줍니다. 발효가 끝난 소금빵 반죽은 우유를 겉면에 발라주고, 펄솔트를 위에 올려줍니다. 섭씨 200도(화씨 395도)로 예열한 오븐에서 15~20분간 노릇해질때까지 구워주세요. 

1. Add sugar and instant dry yeast in warm water, and wait for 5 minutes.
2. In a bowl, put bread flour, cake flour, warm milk, salt, and yeast mixture in a bowl. Knead the dough for 12~15 minutes until it doesn't stick to your hands and becomes smooth. (If the dough still sticky even after 7 minutes or more kneading, add 5g of bread flour and knead. After 1~2 minutes, if it is still sticky, repeat this method.) When the dough is finished, put a wrap on a bowl and let it rise at room temperature for 1 hour 30 min.
3. While the dough is rising, cut the salted butter into elongated rectangles. Refrigerate salted butter until use.
4. When the dough has risen, place it on a cutting board or table and press down with your fingers to clear up the big air bubbles. Divide the dough into 8 equal parts. Make the dough into the ball shape while holding the subdivided dough by palm and attaching the hand blade to the floor. Let it rise at room temperature for 15 minutes.
5. Make a cone shape by roll out one end of the dough by hand. Place the top of the cone facing up, then roll it to a certain thickness with a rolling pin. Make a shape with a scraper and push it into an elongated triangular shape. Put the cut salted butter on the bottom of the triangle and roll it around.
6. Place the finished salt bread dough in an oven pan with the end of the dough facing the bottom. Place a wrap or wet gauze/dishcloth on top, then let it rise at room temperature for a 1hour 30 min. When it has risen, apply milk wash pearl salt(pretzel salt) on top. Bake in an oven preheated to 200 degrees Celsius (395 degrees Fahrenheit)  for 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown.

snippet.title: No-Bake twisted donuts, Chapssal-Gwabaegi(Kwabaegi) :  Korean Street Food Recipe 찹쌀꽈배기 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
11~12 gwabaegies 

-찹쌀꽈배기 chapssal-gwabaegi(twisted buns)
우유 230ml(1cup minus 2tsp) warm milk
인스턴트 드라이 이스트 6g(1+1/2tsp) instant dry yeast
설탕 26g(2Tbsp) sugar
강력분 210g(1+1/2cups) bread flour
찹쌀가루 110g(2/3cup) glutinous rice flour
소금 4g(1/2tsp) salt
식용유 15g(1Tbsp) vegetable oil

-카스테라 꽈배기 castlla ver
카스테라 castella
딸기잼 / 라즈베리잼 berry jam

-설탕꽈배기 cinnamon sugar ver
설탕 sugar
시나몬가루 ground cinnamon


[햇방아] 찹쌀가루: https://bit.ly/3eycOKs
[사프]인스턴트 드라이이스트(레드/125g): https://bit.ly/32Wal6W
[쥬에그]딸기잼: https://bit.ly/3vnsCWV
[브레드가든]계피가루(시나몬가루): https://bit.ly/3dWQcUT


1. 따뜻한 우유에 인스턴트 드라이 이스트, 설탕을 넣고 저어준 다음, 5분간 불려줍니다.
2. 강력분, 찹쌀가루, 소금과 우유-이스트 혼합물, 식용유를 넣고 13~15분간 손반죽을 해줍니다. 반죽이 매끈해질때까지 반죽 후, 랩을 씌운 다음 실온에서 2시간 동안 발효해줍니다.
3. 50~60g씩 반죽을 나눈 다음, 손으로 소분한 반죽을 잡은 손목과 손날을 바닥에 붙인 채 둥글리기를 해줍니다. 둥글리기한 반죽은 실온에서 15분간 발효해줍니다.
4. 반죽을 길게 밀어줍니다(25~30cm, 10~11inches). 반죽의 양 끝을 손바닥으로 가볍게 잡고, 양 끝을 반대방향으로 밀어줍니다. 반죽 양 끝을 잡고 반죽을 위로 올려 꽈배기모양을 만듭니다. 꽈배기 모양이 풀리지 않도록 양 끝을 꼬집어 고정시켜줍니다.
5. 성형한 반죽은 1시간 가량 실온에서 발효시켜줍니다.
6. 기름을 섭씨 180도(화씨 355도)까지 올려준 다음, 꽈배기 색이 노릇해질때까지 튀겨줍니다. 완성된 꽈배기는 식힘망에 적당히 식혀줍니다.

-카스테라 꽈배기
1. 카스테라를 체를 이용해 곱게 가루내줍니다. 
2. 꽈배기에 딸기잼 혹은 라즈베리잼을 바른 다음, 카스테라 가구를 발라 완성해줍니다.

-설탕 꽈배기
1. 설탕과 시나몬가루 적당량을 섞어줍니다. 
2. 완성된 꽈배기를 설탕 시나몬 가루에 돌돌 굴려 완성해줍니다.


1. Add instant dry yeast and sugar to warm milk, stir, and soak for 5 minutes.
2. Add bread flour, glutinous rice powder, salt and milk-yeast mixture, and vegetable oil and hand knead for 13~15 minutes. Knead the dough until smooth. Cover it with a wrap, and let it rise at room temperature for 2 hours.
3. After dividing the dough by 50~60g, and make a the dough into the ball shape while holding the subdivided dough by palm and attaching the hand blade to the floor. Let it rise at room temperature for 15 minutes.
4. Roll the dough into the long string (25~30cm, 10~11inches). Gently hold both ends of the dough with your palms, and push both ends in opposite directions. Hold both ends of the dough and put the dough up to make a twisted shape. Pinching both ends so as not to loosen the shape of the donuts.
5. Let the dough rise at room temperature for about 1 hour.
6. Heat the oil to 180 degrees Celsius (355 degrees Fahrenheit) and fry until the color of the donuts turns golden brown. Cool the finished donut in a cooling rack.

-Castella Ggwabaegi(twisted donuts)
1. Finely powder the castella with a sieve.
2. After applying strawberry jam or raspberry jam to the donut, apply castella powder to finish.

-Sugar Ggwabaegi(twisted donuts)
1. Mix sugar and cinnamon powder.
2. Roll the donuts in sugar cinnamon mixture to finish.

snippet.title: NO KNEAD 🍅🌿Easy Tomato Basil Focaccia Recipe | 토마토 바질 포카치아
snippet.description:
인스턴트 드라이 이스트 5g(1+1/4tsp) instant dry yeast
설탕 3g(1/2tsp) sugar
따뜻한 물A 90ml(1/3cup plus 2tsp) warm water A
따뜻한 물B 270ml(1+1/8cups) warm water B
강력분A 157g(1cup plus 2Tbsp) bread flour A
강력분B 210g(1+1/2cups) bread flour B
소금 6g(3/4tsp) salt
올리브오일A 45g(3Tbsp) olive oil A
올리브오일B 15g(1Tbsp) olive oil B
바질페스토 20-30g(1~2Tbsp)  basil pesto
방울토마토 cherry tomatoes

1.그릇에 이스트와 따뜻한물A를 넣고, 5분간 불려줍니다.
2.이스트물에 강력분A, 설탕, 올리브유A를 넣고 섞어준 후, 따뜻한물B를 넣고 잘 섞어줍니다. 큰 덩어리만 가볍게 풀어준 다음, 15분간 실온발효해줍니다.
3.소금과 강력분B를 넣고 날가루가 보이지 않을 때까지 숟가락 혹은 주걱을 이용해 섞어줍니다. 그리고 바질 페스토를 넣고 가볍게 섞어줍니다. 실온에서 2시간 발효시켜줍니다.
4.발효된 포카치아를 손가락을 이용해 기포들을 정리해준 다음, 반으로 가른 방울토마토를 올려주고 올리브오일을 뿌려줍니다. 섭씨 200도로 예열된 오븐에 25~30분간 노릇해질 때 까지 구워줍니다.

1. Put instant dry yeast and warm water A in a bowl and leave it for 5 minutes.
2. Mix the yeast water with bread flour A, sugar, olive oil A, and then add warm water B and mix well.  Lightly loosen the large chunks, and then let it rise at room temperature for 15 minutes.
3. Add salt and bread flour B and mix with a spoon or spatula until no flour is seen. Then add basil pesto and mix lightly.  Let it rise at room temperature for 2 hours.
4. After arranging the air bubbles with the rise focaccia with your finger, put the cherry tomatoes cut in half and sprinkle some olive oil. Bake in an oven preheated to 200 degrees Celsius(395 degreed Fahrenheit) for 25 to 30 minutes until golden.

🤍인스턴트 드라이이스트(4gx8개입): https://bit.ly/3dadSDu

✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients 
-Dough
240g(1cup) warm water
2 eggs
75g(1/3cup) metled unsalted butter
630g(4 1/2cups) bread flour
8g(1tsp) salt
100g(1/2cup) sugar
10g(2 1/2tsp) dry yeast

-cinnamon sugar mix
145g(2/3cup) light brown sugar
6g(2tsp) ground cinnamon
56g(1/4cup) melted unsalted butter

-frosting
85g(3oz) cream cheese
56g(1/4cup) unsalted butter
240g(1 1/2cup) icing sugar
3g(1/2tsp) vanilla extract
Pinch of salt

1. In a mixer, put bread flour, salt, sugar, dry yeast, warm water and eggs. Mix until crumbly texture. And add melted unsalted butter and knead for 13-17min with mixer. If you make by your hand, knead up to 17~20min.
2. When surface of the dough is smooth and shiny, cover the dough with plastic wrap, and rise for 1 hour in room temp.
3. While dough is rising, prepare the cinnamon-sugar mixture. In a bowl, put light brown sugar and ground cinnamon. With spoon, mix until well combined.
4. Roll the dough into 16*20 inches. Spread the butter with brush or spoon, and sprinkle the cinnamon-sugar mixture onto the buttered dough. Roll the dough, and pinch the end of the dough. Don’t roll tightly. 
5. Cut the dough into 8~ pieces. Place the dough into 9*13 inch pan. Let it rise for 1~1hour 30min. While dough is rising, preheat the oven to 190C / 375F.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 15~20min.(It could take up to 25min, It really depends on how close your dough is, or your pan.)
7. While the cinnamon rolls are baking, let’s make the frosting. In a bowl, whip the cream cheese and unsalted butter. And add icing sugar, vanilla extract and salt. When the rolls are baked, spread the frosting over the hot rolls.


🌙Music
Park Bench
The Mediterranean _ Jazz Piano

snippet.title: Scones w/ Sweet Red Bean Paste & Butter : Anbutter Scone | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello It’s Hailey :) Today’s menu is anbutter (sweet red bean paste and butter) scone.
In Korea, anbutter with something like scone, daquoise, toast, etc… are huge trend since last year I guess.
In lods of cafe, they are selling anbutter scone but I haven’t try yet. So I made myself, and It taste really good.
Of course, I made sweet red bean paste too. How to make that bean paste will show in a next video. In a first time, I wanted to combine with this video. But it will be too long to watch, so I separate it.

In anbutter scone, it has huge chunk of butter inside. So if I use normal recipe of scone, it might be little bit greasy. So instead of butter, I use heavy butter in it. (It called fresh cream scone or siocona scone.)

If you wanna know what drinks I drunk in this video, check out my previous video (Hailey’s monthly cafe : May http://bit.ly/2J7g1Dy)


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey

🌙Ingredients (6 pieces of scone)
200g(1cup plus 6Tbsp) bread flour
6g(1 1/2tsp) baking powder
30g(2Tbsp) sugar
200g(2/3cup plus 3Tbsp) heavy cream
1g(1/8tsp) salt

1 egg
unsalted butter
sweet red bean paste


1. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, sugar and salt all together.
2. Pour the heavy cream and mix until combine all together. Put it in a fridge at least 1 hour.
3. In a flat surface, flatten the dough and divide into 6 pieces.Brush the beaten egg on the scone.
4. Bake in the oven 190C / 375F 12~15min.
5. Cut scone into the half. Spread sweet red bean paste on one side of scone, and top with chunk of unsalted butter. And top with the other side of scone.

snippet.description:
Hello viewers! It’s Hailey again.
In this video, I made custard bread. In South Korea, white bread with jam or cream inside is quite trend right now. Then I just thought, how about custard cream bread? and  I made this.
This dough is quite runny and sticky texture, so It might be hard to knead the dough. I prefer to use bread mixer type of thing. 
It taste was really nice. When I eating white bread, I always eat with jam or other spread. But this bread don’t need spread thing!

For make a custard cream, I used microwave custard recipe, which I showed you in the past video. (http://bit.ly/20WVF2p)

🌙Ingredients (3 cube bread pan or 1 cube bread pan & bread pan)
400g(3cup and 2Tbsp) bread flour
5g(1/2tsp) salt
15g(1Tbsp) milk
25g(5tsp) sugar
17g(1 1/4Tbsp) unsalted butter
7g(1 3/4tsp) dry yeast
220ml(1cup plus 4tsp) water
custard cream

1. Put the yeast in a warm water
2. Mix bread flour, salt and sugar in a bowl, and slowly pour the yeast mixture and milk. Mix until well combined.
3. Add the butter and knead until dough gets smooth texture. (This dough will sticky and runny texture than other bread dough. But after bake, this, it has so moist texture I think.) Let it rise to 1~1hour 30min until double in size.
4. Divide into 3 pieces and let it rise for 15~20min.
5. Using a rolling pin, gently pat into large oval shape. Scoop the custard cream and put on the middle of the dough. Roll up the dough starting on the shortchanged end, into a cylinder shape. Pinch to seal the ends and place into cube pan. Let it rise until almost double in size, 1 hour.
6. Bake in the oven at 180C / 350F for 30~35min.

snippet.description:
Hello, it’s Hailey again!
In this time, I made green tea castella.

Maybe some people know that already, matcha and green tea is almost similar.
But matcha has more deeper taste, so I recommend to use matcha to make this!

You can substitute honey to corn syrup or any kind of sweet-syrup thing for this recipe!
Hope you like this video! And if you like it, be sure to thumbs up this video :)


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Green Grape Tart) : http://bit.ly/2Ik11RQ
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
 
 
🌙Ingredients (1 castella pan, 7.8*4 inch / 20*10 cm)
40g(3Tbsp) vegetable oil
30g(2Tbsp) milk
22g(3 1/4tsp) honey
13g(2 1/2tsp) lemon juice
3 1/2 egg
75g(1/2cup plus 1/2Tbsp) bread flour
42g(4Tbsp) pastry flour
5g(1Tbsp) green tea powder
45g(1/4cup minus 1tsp) granulated sugar for egg yolk
80g(1/3cup plus 2tsp) granulated sugar for egg white
1/2tsp vanilla extract
unsalted butter

1. In a pan, put milk, lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey and bring it to heat until semi-boiling.
2. separate egg into egg white and yolk.
3. Make meringue with sugar and egg white.
4. Mix egg yolk, sugar and vanilla extract with electronic mixer.
5. Sieve bread flour, pastry flour and green tea powder
6. Fold dry ingredients into yolk mixture.
7. Fold meringue into yolk mixture.
8. Put mixture in a pan and bake 155C / 310F for 30~40min.
9. After out in the oven, put unsalted butter top and bottom of the castella and peel of the parchment paper.

snippet.title: No Bake, No Gelatin, ONLY 4 INGREDIENTS 🍮 Custard Pudding
snippet.description:
📸 @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com


안녕하세요, 헤일리 입니다. :)
오랜만에 가져온 영상으로는 더운 여름철, 간단하게 만들 수 있는 푸딩입니다.
오븐에 중탕으로 구우면 40-50분은 훌쩍인데,
냄비에 보글보글 끓이니 반도 안걸려서 완성했어요😘

비 조심, 로나 조심 💦
다들 건강 조심하세요 :)


/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
- 2 puddings

50g(1/4cup) sugar 설탕
30g(2Tbsp) water 물

2 eggs 계란
300ml(1+1/4cups) milk 우유
50g(1/4cup) sugar 설탕
vanilla bean 바닐라 빈 or 5g(1tsp) vanilla extract 바닐라 익스트랙트

1. 설탕과 물 15g(1큰술)을 팬에 넣고, 약불에서 골든브라운~갈색이 될 때까지 가열한다. 이 때 설탕을 젓지 않는다. 골든브라운~갈색이 되면 불을 끄고, 물 15g(1큰술)을 넣고 팬을 잘 돌린다. 
2. 푸딩 용기에 캬라멜 시럽을 부어준다. 그리고 푸딩 혼합물을 만들기 전 까지 냉장고에 넣어 보관한다.
3. 우유, 설탕, 바닐라빈을 냄비에 넣고 약불에서 우유의 가장자리가 살짝 끓을 때까지 끓인다.
4. 계란 2개를 볼에 넣고, 거품기로 잘 풀어준다. 끓인 우유 혼합물을 조금씩 넣어가며 섞는다.
5. 푸딩 혼합물을 체에 걸러낸 다음, 푸딩 용기에 옮겨담는다. 윗면에 거품이 생겼을 경우 걷어낸다.
6. 푸딩 용기가 완전히 들어갈 크기의 냄비를 준비한다. 냄비 뚜껑을 면보로 감싸 준비한다. 
7. 냄비에 키친타올/행주/면보를 깔고, 푸딩 용기를 담는다. 따뜻한 물(섭씨 50-60도)을 푸딩 용기의 1/3 높이만큼 채우고, 중불에 올려 12~15분간 끓인다. 불을 끈 다음, 3~5분간 뚜껑을 덮은 채로 뜸 들인다. 
8. 완성된 푸딩은 냄비에서 꺼내 1시간 가량 실온에서 식힌 다음, 냉장고에서 6시간 이상 차갑게 식힌다.
9. 취향에 따라 아이스크림, 시럽을 올려 먹는다.

1. Put 15g (1 tbsp) of sugar and water in a pan and heat over low heat until golden brown. Do not stir the sugar at this time. When it turns golden brown~brown, turn off the heat, add 15g (1 tbsp) of water and swirl the pan well.
2. Pour caramel syrup into the pudding pan. Then put it in the refrigerator until you make the pudding mixture.
3. Put milk, sugar and vanilla bean in a pot and boil over low heat until the edges of the milk boil slightly.
4. Put 2 eggs in a bowl and beat well with a whisk. Add the boiled milk mixture little by little and mix.
5. After sieving the pudding mixture, transfer to a pudding pan. If bubbles form on the top, remove them.
6. Prepare a pot the size of which will completely fit the pudding pan. Prepare the pot by wrapping the lid of the pot with a cotton cloth.
7. Lay a kitchen towel/dishcloth/cotton cloth on the pot and place the pudding pan. Fill the pudding pan with warm water (50-60 degrees Celsius) to 1/3 the height of the pudding pan, and boil over medium heat for 12~15 minutes. Turn off the heat and simmer with the lid on for 3-5 minutes.
8. Remove the finished pudding from the pot and cool it at room temperature for about 1 hour, then cool it in the refrigerator for at least 6 hours.
9. Serve with ice cream or syrup according to your taste.


🎵 Shades of Spring - Kevin MacLeod

snippet.title: [No Bake] Raspberry Cheese Mousse Recipe 라즈베리 치즈 무스 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS & METHOD /
For 6 width 6.5cm(2.5inch) / height 4cm(1.6inch)  round mousse pan 
Or 1 width 15cm(6inch) / height 4cm(1.6inch) round mousse pan
 
*라즈베리 퓨레 raspberry puree
냉동 혹은 생 라즈베리(산딸기) 300g(10.6oz) frozen or fresh raspberry
설탕 23g(5tsp) sugar
레몬즙 15g(1Tbsp) lemon juice
 
*쿠키 크럼블 cookie crumble
다이제 비스킷 75g(2.6oz) digestive biscuit
녹인 무염버터 23g(1 1/2Tbsp) melted unsalted butter
 
*라즈베리 젤리raspberry jelly
라즈베리 퓨레 165g(5.8oz, 1/2cup plus 1tsp) raspberry puree
설탕 30g(2Tbsp) sugar
판젤라틴 4.5 gelatin sheet (or 가루젤라틴 18g(4 1/2tsp) gelatin powder)
 
*라즈베리 치즈 무스 raspberry cheese mousse
판젤라틴 3 gelatin sheet (or 가루젤라틴 12g(1Tbsp) gelatin powder)
물 52g(3 1/2Tbsp) water
크림치즈 150g(2/3cup) cream cheese
설탕 18g(4tsp) sugar
플레인 요거트 50g(3 1/2Tbsp) plain yogurt
라즈베리 퓨레 90g(1/3cup plus 2tsp) raspberry puree
생크림 100g(1/3cup plus 2tsp) heavy cream
 
*플레인 치즈 무스 plain cheese mousse
판젤라틴 3 gelatin sheet (or 가루젤라틴 12g(1Tbsp) gelatin powder)
크림치즈 150g(2/3cup) cream cheese
설탕 23g(5tsp) sugar
플레인 요거트 8g(1/2Tbsp) plain yogurt
우유 15g(1Tbsp) milk
레몬즙 3g(1/2tsp) lemon juice
생크림 100g(1/3cup plus 2tsp) heavy cream
 
*라즈베리 Extra Raspberry
 허브 Herbs
 
[Raspberry Puree]
1. In a pan, put frozen or fresh raspberry, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring It on medium heat, and keep stirring until all raspberries are mushed together about 6~8 min.
2. Strain seeds. Keep it in room temp until use.
 
[Raspberry Jelly]
1. In a pan, put raspberry puree and sugar, and bring heat to boil.
2. When it starts boiling, remove from the heat and add gelatin powder in it. Mix until all gelatin is melted.
3. Pour into the greased square pan, and chill it about 2 hours in fridge.
 
[Cookie Layer]
1. Put the digestive biscuit in a sealing bag, and smash with rolling pin until it is fine grain.
2. Transfer to the bowl, and add melted unsalted butter and whisk until texture is like wet sand.
3. In 6.5cm(2.5inch) round mousse pan, pack the cookie crumble tightly.
4. Refrigerate until use.
 
[Raspberry Cheese Mousse]
*Using gelatin powder: Soak the gelatin into 52g(3 1/2Tbsp) of water for 5 min.
Using gelatin sheet: Soak the gelatin into ice-cold water for 8-10min.
1. Lightly whip the heavy cream, for 1min 30 ~ 2min at high speed.
2. Put cream cheese, and sugar in the bowl, and whip until all combined.
3. Add plain yogurt, and raspberry puree and mix.
4. Microwave prepared gelatin until melted, about 30sec to 1 min. Add into the raspberry mousse mixture and mix.
5. Put lightly whipped cream and mix until well combined.
6. Pour into the mousse pan, about half of the pan. Refrigerate about 1 hour until semi harden.
 
[Plain Cheese Mousse]
*Using gelatin powder: Soak the gelatin into 52g(3 1/2Tbsp) of water for 5 min.
Using gelatin sheet: Soak the gelatin into ice-cold water for 8-10min.
1. Lightly whip the heavy cream, for 1min 30 ~ 2min at high speed.
2. Put cream cheese, and sugar in the bowl, and whip until all combined.
3. Add plain yogurt, lemon juice, and milk and mix.
4. Microwave prepared gelatin until melted, about 30sec to 1 min. Add into the raspberry mousse mixture and mix.
5. Put lightly whipped cream and mix until well combined.
 
[Assemble]
1. Cut the raspberry jelly about 4cm round.
2. Place the raspberry jelly onto the chilled raspberry cheese mousse.
3. On that, Pour the plain cheese mousse. Refrigerate 2 hours until fully harden.
4. Remove from the mousse pan, and decorate with raspberry and herb(thyme).

 
[라즈베리(산딸기)퓨레]
1. 팬에 냉동 혹은 생 라즈베리, 설탕, 레몬즙을 넣어줍니다. 중불에 올려 준 다음, 6~8분간 계속 저어주며 라즈베리가 으깨질 때 까지 끓여줍니다.
2. 체를 이용해 씨를 걸러 준 다음, 사용하기 전 까지 실온에서 보관합니다.
 
[라즈베리(산딸기 젤리)
1. 팬에 라즈베리 퓨레와 설탕을 넣고 끓여줍니다.
2. 끓기 시작하면 불에서 내려준 다음, 가루젤라틴을 넣고 젤라틴이 모두 녹을 때까지 저어줍니다.
3. 기름칠한 사각 팬(사이즈는 원하는 대로)에 넣고, 2시간 동안 냉장고에서 굳힙니다.
 
[쿠키층]
1. 다이제 비스킷을 비닐봉지에 넣고, 밀대로 부셔줍니다.
2. 그릇으로 옮긴 다음, 녹인 무염버터를 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
3. 6.5cm(2.5인치) 원형 무스팬에 부순 쿠키를 꼭꼭 눌러가며 담아줍니다.
4. 사용하기 전 까지 냉장보관 합니다.
 
[라즈베리 치즈무스]
*가루젤라틴을 쓸 경우: 물 52g(3 1/2큰술)을 넣고 5분간 불려줍니다.
 판젤라틴을 쓸 경우: 차가운 물에 넣고 8~10분간 불려줍니다.
1. 생크림을 1분 30초~2분간 부드러운 뿔이 설 때까지 휘핑합니다.
2. 다른 그릇에 크림치즈, 설탕을 넣고 골고루 섞습니다.
3. 플레인요거트와 라즈베리 퓨레를 넣고 골고루 섞습니다.
4. 불린 젤라틴을 전자레인지에 30초간 돌려 완전히 녹인 다음, 라즈베리 무스 혼합물에 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
5. 아까 휘핑한 생크림을 함께 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
6. 쿠키층을 깐 무스팬 위에 반 정도를 채워줍니다. 어느정도 굳어지도록 1시간 동안 냉장보관 해 줍니다.
 
[플레인 치즈무스]
*가루젤라틴을 쓸 경우: 물 52g(3 1/2큰술)을 넣고 5분간 불려줍니다.
 판젤라틴을 쓸 경우: 차가운 물에 넣고 8~10분간 불려줍니다.
1. 생크림을 1분 30초~2분간 부드러운 뿔이 설 때까지 휘핑합니다.
2. 다른 그릇에 크림치즈, 설탕을 넣고 골고루 섞습니다.
3. 플레인요거트와 레몬즙, 우유를 넣고 골고루 섞습니다.
4. 불린 젤라틴을 전자레인지에 30초간 돌려 완전히 녹인 다음, 치즈 무스 혼합물에 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
5. 아까 휘핑한 생크림을 함께 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
 
[라즈베리 무스 만들기]
1. 라즈베리 젤리를 4cm 원형 크기로 잘라줍니다.
2. 라즈베리 젤리를 아까 굳혀 둔 라즈베리 치즈 무스 위에 올려줍니다.
3. 그 위에, 플레인 치즈무스를 부어준 다음, 냉장고에서 2시간 동안 굳혀줍니다.
4. 무스 틀에서 빼준 다음, 라즈베리와 허브(타임)으로 장식 해줍니다.

snippet.title: THREE INGREDIENTS Vanilla Crème Brûlée Recipe w/ Vanilla Ice Cream🍦: No Torch & Cream | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
4 servings
300g(2cups) vanilla ice cream*
4 egg yolks
60g(4Tbsp) sugar

Preheat the oven to 160C / 325F
1. Melt the vanilla ice cream using a stove or microwave(I used the microwave).
2. Put yolk into melted ice cream and mix, one at a time.
3. Transfer into the ramekin dish. Put the ramekins in tray or baking pan, and fill the baking tray with boiling water, about one third. Bake for 40-50min.
4. After came out of the oven, cool down for a 10-20min. Refrigerate until fully chilled.
5. In a pan, melt the sugar in medium-low heat. Once sugar is fully melted and browned, pour onto the ramekin and swirl to coat evenly. And let it sit for 1-2min.

*I used almost whole 500ml of ice cream. Make sure ‘300g’ is not same as ‘300ml’.


-4개 분량
바닐라 아이스크림 300g(2cups)*
계란노른자 4개
설탕 60g(4Tbsp)

1. 바닐라 아이스크림을 전자레인지나 가스불로 녹여줍니다.
2. 계란노른자를 하나씩 넣어가며 섞어줍니다.
3. 아이스크림 혼합물을 레메킨에 채워줍니다. 레메킨을 베이킹 트레이나 팬에 넣어준 다음, 뜨거운물을 팬의 1/3 정도를 채워줍니다. 40-50분 동안 오븐에서 구워줍니다.
4. 오븐에서 꺼낸 후, 실온에서 10-15분간 식혀줍니다. 냉장고에서 완전히 식혀줍니다.
5. 팬에 설탕을 넣고 중약불에서 설탕결정이 모두 녹고, 골든브라운 색이 될 때까지 끓여줍니다. 레메킨에 부워준 후, 설탕시럽이 골고루 발라지도록 돌려줍니다. 1-2분간 설탕이 굳도록 기다려줍니다.

*저는 아이스크림을 500ml정도 사용했어요. 300g은 300ml가 아니니 주의해주세요!


/ SUBSCRIBE /  http://bit.ly/SweetHailey 
/ INSTAGRAM / @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
/ BLOG / http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o 

/ WATCH PREVIOUS VIDEO /

snippet.title: Coffee Jelly ☕️ 커피젤리 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o


✨ Click here for my latest video(Home cafe June) : http://bit.ly/2XkyLSo
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!


🌙Ingredients(2~3 jello)
300ml(1 1/4cup) boiling water
30g(2Tbsp) ground coffee
20g(4tsp) sugar
5g(1tsp) gelatin powder
50ml(4 1/3Tbsp) water

Lightly whipped cream
Vanilla ice cream
Herbs for decoration


1. Put the gelatin powder into the water
2. Place the coffee filter, add the ground coffee, and pour the boiling water(If you don’t have ground coffee or machine, you can use store bought non-sweet coffee). Microwave the bloomed gelatin for 10~20 sec. Put melted gelatin and sugar, mix well until dissolved completely.
3. Pour the jelly mixture, about half of the cup. Store in the fridge at least 4 hours.
4. Top of the jelly, pour the lightly whipped cream and vanilla ice cream. Decorate with herbs.

snippet.title: No Bake Custard Caramel Pudding 커스터드 캬라멜 푸딩 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Home cafe May) : http://bit.ly/2wBdzwx
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
+Caramel
75g(5Tbsp) sugar
23g(1 1/2Tbsp) water
23g(1 1/2Tbsp) water

+Pudding
3 eggs
450g(2cup minus 2Tbsp) milk
75g(5Tbsp) sugar

1. In a pan, put sugar and water. Turn the heat to medium-low. When sugars all dissolved and gets golden brown to brown, turn off the heat and add water.   Pour the syrup into the ramekin.
2. In a pan or pot, put milk and sugar. Turn the heat too low. When sugars all dissolved and side of the milk gets slightly bubbly, remove the heat.
3. Crack the eggs and pour into the milk mixture. While putting the egg, keep stirring it to prevent the eggs get cooked. Strain the pudding mixture and pour into the ramekin.
4. Place the ramekins into the pot, and fill the pan with warm water. Using a cotton cloth or aluminum foil, cover the ramekins. Cover the pan with lid, turn the heat to high and steam it about 6 min. Turn off the heat and rest for about 1~2 min, with the lid on. After that, cool down in the room temp and put it in a fridge until serve (at least 3 hours).

snippet.title: Strawberry Panna Cotta : No Bake Dessert with French Cream 딸기 판나코타 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello it’s Hailey again!
Today’s menu is strawberry panna cotta. 
If you’re my old subscriber, you know i made panna cotta A LOT.
But reason i always upload panna cotta recipe, because the sauce makes everything.

And also i use same panna cotta recipe, so you can see that I'm obsessed with this recipe😆😆

 Strawberry sauce is not super sweet, so it really match well with it!
And if you double the sugar, you can use for strawberry milk syrup :)

Hope you like this video, and make sure hit that thumbs up button down below!
And I’ll see you guys in tomorrow with another video!


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Kimchi Natto Doria) : http://bit.ly/2rz4MbX
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!
 

🌙Ingredients
+Panna cotta
240ml(1cup) milk
6g(2tsp) gelatin powder
30g(2Tbsp) water
35g(2Tbsp plus 1tsp) sugar
240g(1cup) heavy cream
2.5g(1/2tsp) vanilla extract
pinch of salt

+Strawberry sauce
160g(5.6oz) strawberries
30g(2Tbsp) sugar
5g(1tsp) lemon juice


1. Put the water into gelatin powder and let stand for 5 min.
2. Put the saucepan over a low heat with milk, sugar, and salt
3. When milk is simmering, turn off the heat.  Add gelatin, vanilla extract and heavy cream. Stir until all gelatin lumps are dissolved. 
4. Strain the mixture and pour into a glass  and refrigerate until set, up to 4 hours.
5. For make strawberry sauce, put all ingredients in the sauce pan and boil until all strawberries are mushy, for about 10 min. Strain the sauce and put it in a fridge until use.

snippet.title: Caramel Creme Brulee 캬라멜 크렘브륄레 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, Hailey again!
In this video, I made caramel crème brûlée.

I really wanna make this since last year.
But for make creme brulee, you know, have to use torch.
I was so scared to use torch. But early this year, I learned how to use torch to the chef i worked with.
Since then, I’ve been making some grapefruit with caramelized sugar, and making a creme brûlée like this!

Unlike the original creme brûlée recipe, I also put egg white.
As you can see, It looks like slightly dense when i scooped.
It is not because of the egg white, that’s because burned the sugar overtime (taste great tho.)

Tho I put sugar on top of that, but it’s not insanely-sweet. Because as you can see recipe down below, I didn’t add much sugar on the pudding part. 
It taste like I can eat all of them in one day. You should try it!


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Pumpkin Dacquoise Cookie) : http://bit.ly/2PJudlH
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
✨ I'm not native English speaker, so sorry for my bad English description.
 

🌙Ingredients
500ml(2cup plus 4tsp) heavy cream
1 vanilla bean
130g(2/3cup) sugar
5 egg yolks
2 eggs
10g(1 1/4tsp) salt

sugar

1. In a pan, put heavy cream and vanilla bean. Put the low heat until it gets boil. 
2. Place the sugar into the pan, turn the medium-high heat until all sugar is melted. Don't stir it while heated.
3. Stream the caramelized sugar into the cream mixture while mixing.
4. Beat the eggs and egg yolks. Mix with cream mixture until well combined.
5. Sieve the mixture and pour into the souffle pan.
6. Place the souffle pan into a large-oven pan. And fill with hot water. Bake 150C / 310F for 40~45min. 
7. Cool down the creme brûlée completely. Before you eat, sprinkle some sugar on top and melt with torch.

snippet.title: Earl Grey Chocolate Panna Cotta : No Bake Desserts 얼그레이 초코 판나코타 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
Hello, It’s Hailey.
Today’s menu is earl grey chocolate panna cotta.
You may know, earl grey and panna cotta are two of my favorite things to make with.
I LOVED this recipe, so I really want you guys try it!

Earl grey panna cotta is not that sweet recipe. it’s good to eat with chocolate mousse.
But it is dessert, taste sweet, of course. So if you wanna eat less sweet than, reduce 1tsp of sugar.
And it also good without chocolate mousse. :))


🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o
 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Lemon Bar) : http://bit.ly/2MmQZCl
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
 
 
🌙Ingredients(약 4인분)
+Earl Grey Panna Cotta
240ml(1cup) milk
6g(2tsp) gelatin powder
30g(2Tbsp) water
35g(2Tbsp plus 1tsp) sugar
2 earl grey teabags
240g(1cup) heavy cream
2.5g(1/2tsp) vanilla extract
pinch of salt

+Chocolate Mousse
100g(1/3cup plus 4tsp) heavy cream
100g(3.5oz) dark chocolate

1. Put the water into gelatin powder and let stand for 5 min.
2. Put the saucepan over a low heat with milk, sugar, salt and earl grey teabags.
3. When milk is simmering, turn off the heat and put off the teabags. Add gelatin, vanilla extract and heavy cream. Stir until all gelatin lumps are dissolved. 
4. Pour into a glass  and refrigerate until set, up to 4 hours.
5. In a bowl, put heavy cream and whip lightly. And add melted dark chocolate and mix until all corporate. 
6. Pour the mixture onto semi-firmed panna cotta. Refrigerate again at least 2~3 hours.

Aux Bois by Modoocom

Hello viewers! It’s Hailey again.

Before Hailey’s monthly cafe and what i ate in a month, I uploaded matcha white chocolate scone. On follow that, I made with matcha again.
This recipe is perfect for these weather I think. The highest temperature where i live is over 39 degrees celsius (IM DYING). So feels like I can’t turn the oven long time. 

In this recipe, I’m pretty sure you can use any kind of red bean thingy. Like some red bean jam, red bean paste etc. If you can’t find that kind of thing, you don’t have to use it. It just recommendation.

🌙Ingredients 
240ml(1cup) milk
6g(2tsp) gelatin powder
35g(2Tbsp plus 1tsp) sugar 
10g(1 1/2Tbsp) green tea(matcha) powder
240g(1cup) heavy cream
2.5g(1/2tsp) vanilla extract
pinch of salt
red bean jam
whipped cream

1. In the pot, put milk and sprinkle gelatin. Let it set about 5 min.

snippet.title: Avocado shaped Matcha Mousse : April fool's day 아보카도 녹차무스 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf
🌙 Blog  : http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

✨ Click here for my latest video(My Favorite Pancake Recipe) : http://bit.ly/2Gm9Ute

✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!


Hello, it’s hailey again!
April 1st is just around the corner. In 2016, I made chicken shaped cake pop. Following 2016, I made avocado shaped matcha mousse!
This mousse is inspired by avocado cake in UNAS (dessert cafe in korea) 

For avocado shell, scoop the avocado meat and wash out. Don’t dry completely, just wipe out some water with kitchen paper. If you dry completely, your avocado shell can be cracky. Store in fridge before you use it!

This mousse recipe is not that sweet, so it’s goes well with red bean paste.
I think ganache will be more like avocado seed. But red bean paste is a proper use of matcha, so I used it!

If you just make matcha mousse without red bean paste, than I prefer to add more sugar for egg yolk! (25g(5tsp) will be fine)


🌙Ingredients (4 mousse in a avocado)
6g(3 sheet) sheet gelatin
100g(1/3cup plus 4tsp) milk
5g(1 1/2tsp) matcha powder
1 egg (separated)
20g(4tsp) sugar (for egg white)
20g(4tsp) sugar (for egg yolk)
80g(1/3cup) heavy cream
red bean paste

1. Soak gelatin in cold water.
2. Mix matcha with milk in a pan, put on a low heat.
3. Mix egg yolk and sugar until pale.
4. Pour hot milk into the egg mixture.
5. Sieve the liquid into a pan, and place on a low heat until semi-boiling.
6. Remove form the heat and add gelatin. Leave to cool and whip the cream into soft peaks and fold into the matcha mixture.
7. Make meringue with the egg white and the sugar until soft peak, and fold into the matcha mixture.
8. Pour the mousse into a cup or bowl, and chill for about 2~3 hours.


🌙Music
Spanish rose - Youtube mousic library

snippet.title: Corn Cheese Tart Recipe 콘치즈 타르트 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
10~12 servings
-pastry crust
중력분 280g(2cups) all-purpose flour
설탕 30g(2Tbsp) sugar
소금 8g(1tsp) salt
차가운 무염버터(깍뚝썰기 해 준비) 170g(3/4cup) chilled unsalted butter (cube-sized)
계란 2 eggs

-corn cheese filling
통조림 옥수수 340g(12oz) canned corn
무염버터 15g(1Tbsp) unsalted butter
소금 2g(1/4tsp) salt
마요네즈 30g(2Tbsp) mayonnaise
모짜렐라 치즈 220g(1cup) mozzarella cheese
후추가루 Ground pepper

모짜렐라 치즈 Extra mozzarella cheese or any kind of cheese you prefer
파슬리 Parsley

1. In a bowl, put all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, and cube-sized chilled unsalted butter. Using the scraper, cut the butter(or rub with fingers) into small piece, like pea-sized.
2. Add eggs and mix until came out one dough.
3. Chill it in a fridge for about 1 hour.
4. Drain the canned corn, and mix with butter, salt, mayo, mozzarella cheese, and ground pepper. Set aside in room temp before use.
5. Preheat the oven for 200C / 400F.
6. Divide the dough into 8~10 pieces, and roll the dough on a floured surface. Place it into the cavity of a muffin pan. Use finger, press the dough to evenly flatten against the bottom and sides of the cavity. Make sure as even as you can.
7. Fill the crust shell with corn cheese filling. Sprinkle extra cheese and parsley. Bake in the oven for 20~22 min or air frying 190C / 375F for 25min.

1. 그릇에 중력분, 설탕, 소금, 그리고 깍뚝썰기 한 무염버터를 넣어줍니다. 스크래퍼혹은 손으로 버터를 콩알만한 크기가 될 때 까지 쪼개줍니다.
2. 계란을 넣고 한 덩이로 뭉쳐줍니다.
3. 1시간동안 냉장고에 휴지시켜둡니다.
4. 옥수수 통조림의 물을 빼고, 버터, 소금, 마요네즈, 모짜렐라 치즈, 후추가루를 넣어 골고루 섞어줍니다. 사용하기 전 까지 실온에서 보관해주세요.
5. 오븐을 200C / 400F로 예열해줍니다.
6. 휴지가 끝난 반죽은 8~10등분으로 나눠줍니다. 그리고 잘 밀어준 다음, 머핀 팬 혹은 타르트팬에 채워줍니다. 최대한 고르게 채워주세요.
7. 콘치즈 필링을 꼭꼭 채워넣어준 다음, 그 위에 모짜렐라 치즈와 파슬리를 뿌려 마무리 해 줍니다. 예열한 오븐에서 20~22분간 굽거나 에어후라이기에 190C / 375F에서 25분간 구워줍니다.

-Mugwort latte : Ice, milk, BR black sesame & bean powder flavored ice cream, mugwort sauce(hot water+mugwort powder)
-Korean orange ade/soda : Ice, mashed korean orange, thyme(herb), sprite
-Mango ade/soda : Ice, thyme(herb), mashed mango with honey, soda water, diced mango
-Green apple soda : Ice cubes(water, thyme, raspberry syrup), soda water, green apple syrup

-베리 요거트 스무디 : 얇게 썬 딸기, 베리 콩포트, 베리요거트 스무디, 콘푸레이크, 타임(허브)
-딸기 크림소다 : 얼음, 딸기시럽, 다진 딸기, 탄산수, 배스킨라빈스 바람과함께사라지다
-밀크티 : 밀크티 얼음, 밀크티, 우유
-썸머라떼 : 얼음, 블루 큐라소 시럽, 우유, 에스프레소, 바닐라 아이스크림, 마라시노 체리
-쑥라떼 : 얼음, 우유, 배스킨라빈스 쫀떡궁합, 쑥 소스(뜨거운물+쑥가루)
-천혜향 에이드: 얼음, 으꺤 천혜향, 타임(허브), 스프라이트
-망고 에이드 : 얼음, 타임(허브), 꿀과 함께 으깬 망고, 탄산수, 망고 다이스
-그린애플소다 : 얼음(물, 타임, 라즈베리시럽), 탄산수, 그린애플시럽


+To make a fruit syrup
-Fast : Cut the fruits into small sizes. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar, and a splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small sizes. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hours, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

+과일시럽 만드는 방법
-간단하게 만들기 : 과일을 적당한 크기로 잘라줍니다. 자른 과일과 동량의 설탕을 준비해 줍니다. 설탕은 일반 설탕이나 포도당, 올리고당 등등 사용하셔도. 상관없어요. 저는 설탕과 올리고당 반반으로 자주 만드는 편이에요. 약불로 불을 올려주시고, 과일과 설탕, 그리고 레몬즙 약간을 팬에 넣고 걸쭉해질때까지 졸여줍니다(150g 이하의 경우 8분 안되게 약불에 졸여주고 있어요).
-과일청 만들기 : 병을 먼저 끓는물을 이용해 소독해줍니다. 과일을 적당한 크기로 잘라줍니다. 자른 과일과 동량의 설탕을 준비해 줍니다. 설탕과 자른 과일을 잘 섞어 5~10분정도 과즙이 나오도록 기다려 줍니다(이 과정을 거쳤을때 더 빨리 만들어지는것 같아요). 병에 옮겨 담아준 다음 뚜껑을 닫고, 실온에서 5시간정도 보관해줍니다. 그리고 설탕이 다 녹을 때 까지 냉장고에 보관해준 후 사용합니다. 저는 과일청으로 만드는게 과육이 더 살아있고, 시럽 색이 훨씬 투명해서 선호하는 편이에요. 소량을 만들때는 불에 졸여주는 방법을 사용하고 있는 편이에요.

/ INSTAGRAM / @sweethailey_     http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
/ BLOG / http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

Creme Brûlée Donut w/ rich custard cream: https://bit.ly/3eRwsAf

snippet.title: Gluten Free ✨ Black Sesame Cream Puff w. rice flour : 흑임자 슈크림 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(Homemade Granola) : http://bit.ly/2MYr2WX
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
50g(3 1/2tbsp) unsalted butter
100ml(1/3cup plus 4tsp) water
Pinch of salt
50g(1/3cup) rice flour
2 eggs

250ml(1cup) heavy cream
10g(1/2Tbsp) black sesame paste
25g(5tsp) sugar

-option
Melted dark chocolate
Melted white chocolate
Melted pink(strawberry flavor) chocolate

Before you make : Preheat the oven to 180C / 355F
1. In a pot, put water, salt, and unsalted butter. Melt the butter in low heat.
2. When the butter is all melted, remove from the heat. Add rice flour and mix.
3. Place back to the stove, and mix in low heat. When butter comes out from the dough, it’s time to remove the heat.
4. Add eggs, one at a time, mix until smooth.
5. Transfer the batter into a piping bag. Squeeze the batter on a baking sheet, about 5cm(2inch) round shape. Bake for 30~35min. While it is bake, don’t open the oven.
6. In a bowl, put heavy cream, black sesame paste, and sugar. Mix until it gets a stiff peak. Transfer into the piping bag.
7. Slice the top of the puff, on that, decorate with chocolate. (I tried to make into the Halloween-ish design, but it failed.) And fill the puff with black sesame cream. Place the top of the puff and finish.


🌙Music
Spanish rose - youtube library
Sunshine samba - youtube library

snippet.title: Homemade Granola : super easy recipe  초간단 홈메이드 그래놀라 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(cheesecake with rice flour) : http://bit.ly/2VJZx7u
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!


🌙Ingredients
120g(1 1/2cups) rolled oats
45g(1/4cup) pumpkin seeds
75g(1/2cup) roughly chopped almonds
66g(1/2cup) chopped dried prunes
35g(1/2cup) shredded coconut

1g(1/4tsp) ground cinnamon
2g(1/4tsp) salt
80g(1/4cup) maple syrup
55g(1/4cup) coconut oil

Before you make : Chop almonds and dried prunes. Preheat the oven in 160C / 320F
1. In a bowl, put rolled oats, pumpkin seeds, roughly chopped almonds, ground cinnamon, salt, maple syrup, and coconut oil. Stir to coat well.
2. Transfer the mixture to the pan and spread evenly. Bake for 15min.
3. When it came out in the oven, add shredded coconut and dried prunes, toss well until fully corporated. And back to the oven, bake another 5~10 min, until it gets golden brown color.
4. Chill it on a cooling rack. Store in an airtight container in room temp for up to 1 month.


🌙Music
Count me in - modoocom
Dun working - modoocom

snippet.title: No Bake : Sweet Crepes with. Figs 무화과 크레페 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(fig cheesecake) : http://bit.ly/2phREKp
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!

 
🌙Ingredients
2 eggs
320g(1 1/3cup) milk
93g(2/3cup) pastry flour
10g(2tsp) melted unsalted butter
10g(2tsp) sugar
Pinch of salt

100g(1/3cup plus 4tsp) heavy cream
10g(2tsp) cream cheese
10g(2tsp) sugar

Figs
Fig jam
Honey
Herb(thyme)

Cooking oil

1. In a bowl, put flour, sugar, and salt. Whisk lightly. 
2. Add eggs and mix until well combined. And add milk, 2/3cup at a time. Pour melted unsalted butter and mix. Keep it in a fridge at least 30 min.
3. In medium-low heat, drizzle some cooking oil and coat with a kitchen towel. Pour the batter into a pan, very thinly. When the surface is dry, flip the crepe. And cook about another 1~1min 30sec. 
4. Put heavy cream, sugar, and cream cheese into a bowl or container. Whip until stiff peak.
5. Serve the crepes with cream cheese cream, fig, fig jam, honey and garnish with herbs.

-
Eng recipe will update soon!

1. 피클을 먼저 만들어 줍니다; 오이와 무, 당근을 두께감 있는 골패썰기를 해줍니다. 그릇에 페페론치노, 사과식초, 설탕, 소금을 넣고 잘 섞어준 다음, 썰어둔 야채를 넣고 골고루 섞어준 다음 최소 30분 이상 냉장고에서 숙성시켜줍니다.
2. 돼지불고기에 피쉬소스, 간장, 다진마늘, 설탕을 넣고 잘 버무려줍니다. 약 10분간 실온에서 숙성시켜줍니다.
3. 스리라차소스, 마요네즈, 레몬즙, 꿀을 넣고 골고루 섞어줍니다.
4. 후라이팬에 식용유를 두르고 계란 2개를 넣어준 다음 스크램블 에그를 만들어 줍니다.
5. 다시 후라이팬에 식용유를 두른 다음, 양념에 재워둔 고기를 구워줍니다. 소스가 다 졸아들 때 까지 구워줍니다.
6. 베트남 쌀 바게트의 가운데를 잘라준 다음, 속을 약간 파내줍니다. 소스를 골고루 발라주고, 피클-스크램블에그-돼지고기 순으로 올려준 다음 고수를 이용해 장식해줍니다. 남은 피클과 함께 드셔주세요!

✨ Click here for my latest video(yogurt ice cream) : http://bit.ly/2Uj67Bg
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!
 
 
🌙Menu
Real Melonade : ice, melon syrup, melon(melon cube, melon slice), soda water, thyme
Affogato : yogurt ice cream, espresso coffee, rosemary, thyme, cocoa powder
Vanilla Marble Latte : ice, water, espresso coffee, milk
Peach Yogurt : granola, plain yogurt, peach, ice cream, thyme
Hong Kong Style Milk Tea : ice, black tea syrup, milk, espresso coffee

+To make fruit syrup
-Fast : Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. You can use any kind of sugar, glucose, oligosaccharide, etc.. I prefer to use half plain white sugar and half oligosaccharide. Turn the heat to low, mix fruits, sugar, and a splash of lemon juice all together until thickened (Make with less than 150g, it took 8min or less.)
-Preserved : Prepare the water bath jar. Cut the fruits into small size. Measure the fruits and prepare the same amount of sugar. In a bowl, mix fruits and sugar. Rest 5~10min to fruit juice is come out (This process makes syrup faster). Ladle the mixture into a jar and cover the lid. Rest in room temp for 5 hours, and put it in a fridge until all sugar is melted. Preserve one’s flesh is more fresh and meaty. And syrup texture is more clear, so I prefer to make this way.

snippet.title: Homemade Kiwi Lemonade 🥝🍋 Summer Drinks 키위레모네이드 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
🌙Subscribe  : ‪http://bit.ly/SweetHailey
🌙 Instagram : @sweethailey_     ‪http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf 
🌙 Blog  : ‪http://bit.ly/1qjCp8o

 
✨ Click here for my latest video(fluffy souffle pancakes) : http://bit.ly/2YSA9wY
 
✨ Give this video a thumbs up if you enjoyed it!

✨ I'm not a native English speaker, sorry for my bad English description.
✨ 한국어로 된 더보기란을 보고싶으시다면 유튜브 사용언어를 한국어로 바꿔서 확인해주세요!


 
🌙Ingredients
3 lemon
5 kiwi fruit
700g(3 1/2cup) sugar

Before you make
1. Sprinkle baking powder into the fruits and rub gently. Pour the water and let it set for 10~15 min. After that, in boiling water, add a tablespoon of vinegar and put a lemon for about 3~5sec and get that out. This process is to clean the skin of the fruit from the pesticide or bad chemicals.
2. In a pot, pour water(not VERY cold). Place the glass jar upside down. Bring it to boil. Once it’s boiling, turn off the heat and remove the jar. Chill that out and let air-dry it.

1. Slice the lemon thinly.
2. Scoop the kiwi fruit, and dice it.
3. In a bowl, add sliced lemon and kiwi. Add sugar and mix nicely.
4. Once sugar gets all the moist, transfer into the dried jar.
5. Keep it in the fridge for 3~7 days, until all sugars are dissolved. And drink/eat with water, sparkling water, or soft drinks you like.

snippet.title: 🍓Easy Strawberry Tiramisu Recipe
snippet.description:
Eng subtitle is available🧡
📸 @sweethailey_ (http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf)
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com

/ INGREDIENTS 재료 /
-4 strawberry tiramisu
-딸기 티라미수 4개
(container size 상자 사이즈: 118*60*50mm, 270ml)

🍓 Strawberry Sauce 딸기소스
150g(8~9, 5.3oz) strawberries 딸기
45g(3Tbsp) sugar 설탕
10g(2tsp) lemon juice 레몬즙

🍓 Mascarpone Cream 마스카포네 크림
105g(1/2cup) heavy cream, cold 생크림, 차가운 상태
32g(2Tbsp) sugar 설탕
180g(1cup) mascarpone cheese, room temp  마스카포네 치즈, 실온

ladyfingers 레이디핑거
12~13 strawberries 딸기
icing sugar 슈가파우더

1. 딸기소스 만들기 : 딸기를 그릇에 넣고 으깬 다음, 설탕, 레몬즙을 넣고 섞는다. 1시간 정도 설탕이 녹을 때까지 실온에서 보관한다.
2. 딸기 2~3개는 꼭지를 자르지 않고 반으로 갈라 준비한다. 나머지 딸기는 다져 준비한다.
3. 마스카포네 크림 : 실온의 마스카포네 치즈를 주걱으로 가볍게 섞는다.
4. 생크림에 설탕을 넣고, 핸드믹서로 80% 가량 휘핑한다. 
5. 마스카포네 치즈에 휘핑한 생크림 1/3을 넣고 주걱으로 가볍게 섞는다. 나머지 생크림을 함께 넣고 골고루 섞는다. 완성된 크림은 짤주머니에 담아 준비한다.
6. 용기에 딸기소스를 2스푼 가량 깔고, 위에 레이디핑거 2개를 올린다. 그 위에 딸기소스를 얹고, 다진 딸기를 올린다. 그 위 마스카포네 크림을 짜 올리고, 스패출러로 윗면을 정리한다. 냉장고에서 3시간 이상 휴지한다.
7. 완성된 티라미수 위 슈가파우더, 반으로 가른 딸기를 올려 완성한다.

1. Strawberry Sauce: Put strawberries in a bowl and mash them, then add sugar and lemon juice and mix. Store at room temperature until the sugar dissolves, about 1 hour.
2. Prepare 2-3 strawberries by cutting them in half without cutting the stems. Chop the rest of the strawberries.
3. Mascarpone Cream : Lightly mix room temperature mascarpone cheese with a spatula.
4. Add sugar to the whipped cream and whip about 80% with a hand mixer.
5. Add 1/3 of whipped cream to mascarpone cheese and mix lightly with a spatula. Add the rest of the whipped cream and mix evenly. Prepare the finished cream by putting it in a piping bag.
6. Spread about 2 tablespoons of strawberry sauce in a container, and put 2 ladyfingers on top. On top of that, put strawberry sauce and put chopped strawberries. Squeeze the mascarpone cream on top and clean the top with a spatula. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours.
7. Finished tiramisu with sugar powder and halved strawberries.

Modern Attempt - TrackTribe

snippet.title: No Bake No Egg 💗Heart Marshmallows 💗fValentine's Day Recipe
snippet.description:
Eng subtitle is available🧡
📸 @sweethailey_ (http://bit.ly/2zdyjxf)
✉️ sweethiley@gmail.com

/ INGREDIENTS & METHODS /
하트 마시멜로 약 40~50개
about 40~50 Heart Marshmallows

9g(2tsp) gelatin powder 가루 젤라틴
60g(1/4cup) cold water (for gelatin) 찬 물 (젤라틴용)
200g(1cup) sugar 설탕
60g(1/4cup) cold water (for sugar) 찬 물 (설탕용)
1g(1/8tsp) salt 소금

5g(1tsp) vanilla extract 바닐라 익스트랙
Red food coloring 빨간색 식용색소
starch+icing sugar (3:2 ratio) 전분+슈가파우더(3:2 비율)

1. 찬 물에 가루 젤라틴을 넣고 5분간 불린다.
2. 냄비에 설탕, 소금, 한 물을 넣고, 중불에 올린다. 설탕이 모두 녹을 때까지 불에 올린다.
3. 설탕이 모두 녹으면, 젤라틴을 넣고 가볍게 저은 후 불을 끈다.
4. 그릇으로 설탕 혼합물을 옮긴 다음, 5~7분가량 식힌다.
5. 휘핑기를 이용해 고속으로 휘핑한다. 중간에 빨간색 식용색소를 넣고 휘핑한다. 덩어리가 질 때까지 약 10분간 휘핑한다. 완성된 마시멜로는 짤주머니에 담아 준비한다.
6. 전분과 슈가파우더를 섞은 다음, 유산지 혹은 테프론시트 위에 솔솔 뿌린다.
7. 하트 모양으로 마시멜로를 짠다. 그리고 윗면에 전분과 슈가파우더를 뿌린다.

1. Add gelatin powder to cold water and bloom for 5 minutes.
2. Put sugar, salt, and water in a pot and place on medium heat. Heat until all the sugar is dissolved.
3. When all the sugar is dissolved, add gelatin, swirl lightly, and turn off the heat.
4. Transfer the sugar mixture to a bowl and let it cool for 5-7 minutes.
5. Whip at high speed using a whipper. Add red food coloring in the middle and whip again. Whip for about 10 minutes, in total, until lumpy. Transfer the marshmallow to a piping bag.
6. After mixing starch and sugar powder, sprinkle lightly on parchment paper or a Teflon sheet.
7. Squeeze marshmallows into a heart shape. Then sprinkle starch and powdered sugar on the top.


/ MUSIC /
Walk Through the Park - TrackTribe
Shades of Spring - Kevin MacLeod

snippet.title: 🍫Hot Cocoa Bomb☕️ for Valentine's Day : Hot Chocolate Bomb Recipe 핫 코코아 밤 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
-다크 & 화이트 코코아 밤 12개 분량
-12 dark and white cocoa bomb

밀크초콜릿 300g(10.6oz) milk chocolate
화이트초콜릿 300g(10.6oz) white chocolate
블루베리맛 초콜릿 100g(3.5) blueberry flavored chocolate
핫초코 가루 hot cocoa powder
디하이드레이티드 마시멜로우 dehydrated marshmallows
스프링클 sprinkles

1. 큰 짤주머니에 다크초콜릿, 화이트초콜릿, 블루베리맛 초콜릿을 각각 넣어줍니다. 윗부분을 테이프로 막아줍니다.
2. 큰 그릇에 초콜릿이 들은 짤주머니를 넣고 뜨거운 물을 부어줍니다. 5분간 초콜릿이 녹을 때까지 기다려줍니다.
3. 초콜릿이 다 녹으면, 짤주머니를 살짝 자른 다음 초콜릿을 반구 실리콘 틀에 1~2큰술 씩 넣어줍니다.  숟가락 / 스패출러 / 브러쉬 등을 이용해 골고루 발라줍니다. 5분간 냉장고에서 굳혀준 다음, 다시 한 번 발라줍니다. 총 3~4번을 발라 단단한 반구를 만들어줍니다.
4. 오븐 트레이를 섭씨 160도(화씨 320도)에 5분간 넣어 뜨겁게 준비 해 줍니다. 초콜릿은 실리콘 몰드에서 분리해줍니다.
5. 초콜릿 반구 안에 핫초코 믹스 1~2큰술과 디하이드레이티드 마시멜로우, 스프링클을 뿌려줍니다.
6. 다른쪽 초콜릿 반구는 뜨거운 오븐 트레이에 올려 살짝 녹여준 다음, 핫초코가 든 초콜릿 위에 올려줍니다. 틈이 생겼다면 녹은 초콜릿을 발라주면 좋아요. 윗면에 초콜릿과 스프링클을 뿌려 완성해줍니다.

1. Put dark chocolate, white chocolate, and blueberry flavor chocolate in a large piping bag. Seal it with tape.
2. Put piping bags with chocolate in a large bowl and pour hot water. Sit for 5 minutes until the chocolate is melted.
3. When the chocolate is completely melted, cut the piping bag and then add 1~2 tablespoons of chocolate to the half-sphere silicone mold. Apply evenly with a spoon / spatula / brush. Let it set in the fridge for 5 minutes, then apply again. Apply a total of 3-4 times to make a solid half-sphere.
4. Put the oven tray at 160 degrees Celsius (320 degrees Fahrenheit) for 5 minutes to prepare it hot. Separate the chocolate from the silicone mold.
5. Add 1~2 tablespoons of hot chocolate mix, dehydrated marshmallows, and sprinkles inside the half-sphere chocolate.
6. Place the other half of the chocolate on a hot oven tray, melt it slightly, and place it on top of the chocolate with hot chocolate. If there is a gap, it is good to apply melted chocolate to completely sealed. Sprinkle chocolate and sprinkles on the top to finish.

*디하이드레이트 마시멜로우 대신 미니 마시멜로우를 넣어도 좋아요
*It’s good to replace the dehydrated marshmallow to mini marshmallow.

snippet.title: No Heavy Cream❌ Pave Chocolate made with milk : Milk Pave Chocolate 생크림 없이 우유 생초콜릿 만들기
snippet.description:
/ INGREDIENTS /
다크초콜릿 500g(17.6oz) dark chocolate
따뜻한 우유 172g(11 1/2Tbsp) warm milk
코코아 파우더 cocoa powder

1. Place the bowl in a pot with boiling water (double-boiler). In the bowl, put dark chocolate and stir to melt.
2. When chocolate is all melted, add warm milk, and stir to combine.
3. Pour it into the 15 cm square pan, and refrigerate at least 2 hours.
4. When it’s firmed up, remove from the pan, and cut into 16 pieces. Roll the pave chocolate into the cocoa powder.

1. 뜨거운 물이 담긴 냄비 혹은 그릇 위에 그릇을 올려줍니다(중탕). 그릇 안에 다크초콜릿을 넣고, 녹을 때까지 잘 저어줍니다.
2. 초콜릿이 다 녹게되면, 따뜻한 우유를 넣은 다음 잘 섞어줍니다.
3. 15cm 사각 팬에 초콜릿을 부어준 다음, 냉장고에서 2시간 이상 굳혀줍니다.
4. 초콜릿이 단단하게 굳게 되면, 틀에서 초콜릿을 제거한 다음, 16조각으로 잘라줍니다. 파베 초콜릿을 코코아파우더에 굴려서 완성해줍니다.

snippet.title: Bark Chocolate Recipe : How To Temper Chocolate for Valentine's Day
snippet.description:
다크 커버춰 초콜릿 200g(7oz) dark couverture chocolate
화이트 커버춰 초콜릿 200g(7oz) white couverture chocolate
라즈베리 인스피레이션 초콜릿 180g(6.3oz) raspberry inspiration chocolate
건조 오렌지 칩 Orange chips (dried)
건조 자몽 칩 Grapefruit chips (dried)
동결건조 라즈베리 Raspberry (freeze-dried)
동결건조 딸기 Strawberry slice (freeze-dried)
오레오 Oreos
프레첼 Pretzel
아몬드 슬라이스 Almond slices

1. 냄비에 물을 넣고 중불에 올려줍니다. 물에서 기포가 생기며 끓기 시작하면, 불에서 내려줍니다. 다른 냄비 혹은 그릇에는 얼음물을 준비 합니다.
2. 끓는 물이 담긴 냄비 위에 유리, 스테인레스 등의 소재로 된 그릇을 올려준 다음, 초콜릿을 템퍼링 해 줍니다.
먼저 40~45도(화이트초콜릿, 라즈베리인스피레이션), 섭씨 45~50도(다크초콜릿)까지 초콜릿을 녹인 다음, 얼음물에서 25~26도(화이트초콜릿, 라즈베리인스피레이션), 섭씨 27~28도(다크초콜릿)까지 식혀줍니다. 다시 따뜻한 물에 작업가능한 온도인 29~30도(화이트초콜릿, 라즈베리인스피레이션), 섭씨 31~32도(다크초콜릿)까지 온도를 올려가며 초콜릿을 녹여줍니다. 템퍼링이 끝난 초콜릿은 짤주머니에 담아 준비 해줍니다.

*녹이는 온도 👉🏻 식히는 온도 👉🏻 작업 온도
화이트초콜릿 / 라즈베리 인스피레이션 : 섭씨 40~45도 👉🏻 섭씨 25~26도 👉🏻 섭씨 29~30도
다크초콜릿 : 섭씨 45~50도 👉🏻 섭씨 27~28도 👉🏻 섭씨 31~32도

3. 바크초콜릿 몰드에 초콜릿을 짜 넣고, 말린과일(오렌지칩, 자몽칩, 라즈베리 홀, 딸기 슬라이스) 혹은 오레오, 프레첼, 견과류(아몬드) 등을 이용해 꾸며줍니다.
*오레오 초콜릿 : 오레오 5개를 부숴줍니다. 템퍼링한 화이트 초콜릿 100g에 부순 오레오를 넣어 함께 섞어줍니다. 바크초콜릿 몰드에 채워넣어 굳혀줍니다.

1. Put water in a pot and heat it over medium heat. When the water starts to boil, remove it from the heat. In another pot or bowl, prepare ice water.
2. Place a glass, stainless steel bowl on a pot, and then temper the chocolate.
First, melt the chocolate to 40~45 degrees Celsius (white chocolate, raspberry inspiration), 45~50 degrees Celsius (dark chocolate), then cool down the temp with ice-cold water until 25~26 degrees Celsius (white chocolate, raspberry inspiration), 27~28 degrees Celsius (dark chocolate). In warm water, melt the chocolate by raising the temperature to 29~30 degrees Celsius (white chocolate, raspberry inspiration) and 31~32 degrees Celsius (dark chocolate) using a hot water bath. Prepare the tempered chocolate in a piping bag.

* Melting temperature 👉🏻 Cooling temperature 👉🏻 Working temperature
White Chocolate / Raspberry Inspiration: 40 ~45 degrees Celsius 👉🏻 25~26 degrees Celsius 👉🏻 29~30 degrees Celsius
Dark chocolate: 45~50 degrees Celsius 👉🏻 27~28 degrees Celsius 👉🏻 31~32 degrees Celsius

3. Squeeze the chocolate into the bark chocolate mold and decorate it with dried fruit (orange chips, grapefruit chips, raspberry holes, strawberry slices) or Oreos, pretzel, nuts (almonds).
*Oreo Chocolate: Crush 4~5 Oreos. Add the crushed oreo to 80 g of tempered white chocolate and mix together. Fill in the bark chocolate mold to harden.

🤍[벨코라데]화이트커버처초콜릿(커버춰초콜릿/200g): https://bit.ly/3bWCGQf
🤍[벨코라데]다크커버춰초콜릿55.7%(200g): https://bit.ly/3qxgEYy
🤍[발로나]핑크칼라커버춰초콜릿(인스피레이션/라즈베리/180g): https://bit.ly/3qEVY0S
🤍오렌지칩(50g/건조과일/국내산): https://bit.ly/39VlJ66
🤍자몽칩(50g/건조과일/국내산): https://bit.ly/3pb8SDy

snippet.title: ONLY TWO INGREDIENTS! Heart Shaped Sugar Cookies : Valentine's Day Recipe | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
= INGREDIENTS =
215g(1 1/2cup) pancake pre-mix
100g(7Tbsp) unsalted butter (room temp)

Red food coloring (optional)
White chocolate (for decoration, optional)
Any kind of flour you have 

1. In a bowl, put butter and mix until creamy.
2. Add pancake mix and mix until combined. And put red food coloring, and mix.
3. On a floured surface, roll out the dough. Use a cookie cutter and cut as many as possible. Place the shapes on a cookie pan.
4. Refrigerate / freeze for 10min. Bake 180C / 355F for 8~10min.
5. After chilled, decorate with melted white chocolate

snippet.title: Strawberry Chocolate Fondue : Valentine's Day Recipe 딸기 초코 퐁듀 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
= INGREDIENTS =
16~20 strawberries
160g(1cup) strawberry-flavored chocolate (or pink couverture chocolate, candy melts, etc.)
50g(1/4cup) white chocolate (or candy melts)
Popping sugar
Sugar pearl sprinkles
Strawberry flavored cookie crunchy (cookie crunky in Korea)
white chocolate for decor

Before you make : washing and drying strawberries
1. Melt strawberry and white chocolate using a double boiler. 
2. Withholding the stem, dip the strawberry into the melted chocolate. And leave it on parchment paper.
  1) After dip in melted chocolate, dip again in a popping sugar.
  2) Dip again in strawberry-flavored cookie crunchy
  3) Sprinkle some sugar pearl sprinkles
  4) Drizzle some melted white chocolate
After decoration, leave it to cool down.

snippet.title: Flower Chocolate Bark 꽃 바크 초콜릿 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
발렌타인데이 영상 세번째로 초초간단이면서 짱짱이쁜 꽃 바크초콜릿을 만들어봤어요
혹시나 누구 주고싶은데 시간 얼마 안남으신분들..!
줄사람이 있다는거에 배가아프다만 암튼 이거 짱짱입니다요!

혹시 짤주머니가 없으시면, 지퍼팩에 담고 구멍 조그만하게 뚫어서 사용하시면 돼요
근데 초콜릿이 묽어서 은근 다루기 힘드실텐데, 저는 초콜릿 녹이고 사아알짝 굳기 시작할때 사용했어요
아니면 너무 묽어서 작업하기 힘들어요 ㅠㅠ 혹은 구멍 진짜 조그만하게 뚫어서 만드시는거 추천!

snippet.title: Red Wine Chocolate Truffle 레드 와인 초콜릿 트러플 | SweetHailey
snippet.description:
발렌타인데이 영상 두번째로 레드와인 초콜릿 트러플을 만들어봤어요
레드와인의 맛도 충분히 나는 트러플이라 많이 먹으면 취할지도 몰라요!

아쉽게도 미성년자분들은 알콜을 거의 날리지 않고 만드는거라 드시기 힘들지도 모르겠어요 ㅠㅠ
레드와인이 아니라, 그냥 가나슈를 채워넣어도 맛있는 초콜릿을 만들 수 있어요!
초콜릿 1 : 생크림 2 의 비율로 전자렌지 등에 녹여 만드신 후에, 레드와인 초콜릿 필링 대신에 넣으시면 완전 맛있는 초콜릿 트러플이 만들어질거에요 :)

아 그리고 저도 남친없습니다.. 그 날이 무슨날이냐고 댓글로 남기시던데.. 저도 사실 잘모르겠어요…
